You cannot really attempt to hide while standing on a sheet of paper at waist height. Instead, you jump up and down, shouting and waving your arms in the direction of the giantess as she prowls the chamber, scooping up the occassional mass of clothing to deposit into her basket. You are getting tired by the time she finally lumbers towards you, your movements clearly not enough to catch her massive eye.

Indeed, she seems more intrigued by the thin letters that you've been scraping, her immense thumb pressing down on the sheet of paper as she lifts it skyward for a closer look. You find it hard to maintain your balance, but the colossal form of flesh and bone is not too far away - you could make a leap and grab onto the woman like an insect. Otherwise, you'll have to leap to the surface of Richard's table before you are dropped off into oblivion, to await rescue at a later date.
11112122111112111111.title: Over Here!

choices: Get back to writing
What's the point?
111121221111121111112.content:
While it's still safe, you scamper to the table while you can, allowing the woman to take the paper and raise it the incalculable distance to her face.

"'He'?" she says, flipping the paper over to check if there's anything on the other side. Shrugging, she moves to place it back down, smothering you beneath the weighty material. It's not enough to crush you, but at your tiny size you can't just push it off yourself. You struggle, crawling toward the distant edge and light, the woman's monstrous movements and noises outside.

Come on, come on, you tell yourself, got to get back where she can see me before she leaves!

But no, as you breach and emerge from under the paper, the woman is long gone. You are alone. Should've jumped for her when you had the chance! Still, she left everything here, so you can complete the message, should you so desire...
111121221111121111112.title: Read The Message!

1111212211111211111122.content: You don't bother to finish the message as you sit on the table. You sit there for so long that you don't notice when someone puts a cup on the table. Unfortunately, the edge of the cup came directly onto you as you get crushed by the cup itself
1111212211111211111122.title: What's the point?!

choices: Trek off on your own
Hitch a lift
111121221111122.content:
You're still alive. You attribute your survival to the fact that, at one eighth of an inch tall, your mass is too tiny to take impacts that hard. Also, this coating of goo must have cushioned you a little.

You try to wipe some of the sticky stuff off yourself by rubbing against the towering strands of carpet surrounding you. You are having a mild success when you notice the looming structure ahead of you.

A sheer wall of white, which then gives way to a shelf leading up to an even more impossibly tall pillar. Only when you spot the matching structure some distance off to your left do you conclude that these must be the feet of Richard's mother!

The distant sounds above you must be her scolding her wayward son. Personally, you hope that the little pervert gets a really terrible punishment.

As for you, it's time to go. Your situation has worsened since you first left the bar, and your chances of finding help have decreased proportionately with your size.

It's going to be a long trek out of the boy's room, but you certainly don't want to stick around here for long.

There is another way, however; this wall of shoe worn by the giantess before you shouldn't be TOO hard to climb - you could let her carry you to safety!
111121221111122.title: Feet.  Big Feet.

1111212211111221.content:
When will you learn? Last time you wandered away from a female's foot at your size, she saw you and put you into this predicament. The second time, you won't be so lucky.

To Richard's mother, you are but a bug crawling along the floor of her son's room. She barely has to expend any effort to raise her foot and move it across to crush it.

You notice the shadow, but that moment of realisation is followed immediately by crushing pain as fully half the weight of the goddess falls upon you, pressing you between her shoe's sole and the hard, hard floor. She doesn't bother dragging you back and forth at all, content to let simple pressure end you.

Your death is relatively merciful, a single moment of utter agony followed by total oblivion. And you can rest easy knowing that Richard did indeed suffer a terrible punishment; his favourite pet was taen away from him forever.
1111212211111221.title: Second Time, Really?

choices: Investigate the toe some
Trust to your tiny size to see you safe
1111212211111222.content:
At this beyond-tiny size, climbing isn't too hard. The same, generous physics that allowed you to fall without harm allow you to cling to handholds that would be invisible to larger folk. So THIS is how all those insects manage it!

In no time at all you are standing before the imposing toes of Richard's mother. Even the smallest one sarfs you in height and mass, and you begin to have second thoughts about the sanity of your plan. Impacts may not faze you much, but being crushed would certainly put a crimp on your day.

The booming sound of a mother scolding her son continues above you, so you have some time to decide on the next part of your plan. Should you approach the building-sized toe, for some shelter and comfort? Even that overhanging nail, a distant source of shade, would be an easy place to conceal yourself.

Alternatively, should you keep away from the woman entirely, distrustful of her behemothic capacity to cause you to die? You could stay here, a far, far distance away from her flesh and hold on to the base of her sandal as she walks away. You're pretty sure you're not going to be flung off.
1111212211111222.title: An Insect on the Sandal

choices: You remain in place until the woman goes to feed her cat
You remain in place until the woman makes to change her footwear
11112122111112221.content:
Swallowing back your terror, you edge closer. These toes are about twice as big as those of the young girl that picked you up and got you into this trouble, and you are once again dumbfounded by your insignificance. There's absolutely no chance of the mother noticing you even if she did look -

The toe rears up before you, flexing in agitation at something that Dick said. It may have been the final straw, as now the woman moves towards her son, and you barely have enough time to place both your hands on her thickly fleshed toe before it launches off into space along with the rest of her foot...

The force exerted upon you seems phenomonal, even though it is a simple case of a woman shuffling one of her feet forward a few inches. When it impacts again, with the sound of a thousand hurricanes, you release your grip and fall to slap against the base of the sandal heavily. That was just one step. If she were to begin walking...

Lying on your back, you gaze up the infinite expanse of ankle that leads to the jeans. If you could only get higher, then there'd be less chance of your being shaken free. Can you count upon her to remain stationary long enough to climb though? It was a hard enough slog up the base of her sandal, let alone a leg.

Your thoughts are interrupted as she stamps her foot in irritation, bouncing you about like a grain of sand. You crawl to your knees and plead with her to stop, but nothing you say will have any effect on the woman. You're going to have to take matters into your own, miniscule hands. Scuttling into the valley separating her biggest toe from the others like the ant that you so closely resemble, you breathe in its unique aroma. It's like another world.

Here, shadowed from the light and enclosed by pulsing, warm flesh, you begin to relax. You lean against the wall before you, hoping that here you may be sheltered from the worst of the weather that this goddess may whip up in her journeys.
11112122111112221.title: Goddess

choices: Jump off her foot
Continue clinging to her toes
111121221111122212.content: The giantess finishes scolding her son and starts walking to her room, unaware of you and your efforts not to get smashed by her toes. You barely manage to hang on during the terrible trip, and are quite dismayed when the goddess slips off her sandal, leaving you dangling quite perilously, hanging onto her toe. You could jump off her foot now, so you don't run the risk of being squashed inside her new footwear, or you could continue holding onto her foot. Last time you tried escaping a woman's feet it didn't go too well, but this time she might be distracted enough to not notice you.
111121221111122212.title: New shoes

choices: Roll to the right
Roll the left
1111212211111222121.content: You let go of her toes, and land on your back on the carpet. Dazed for a moment, you aren't aware of the giantess's sandal falling on you until it's right on top of you. Luckily, it doesn't injure you because of the relatively soft ground. The giant woman bends down to pick up her dropped sandal, and as she does she spots your tiny figure lying on the ground. Seeing you as nothing but an insignificant ant, she brings her bare foot speeding down towards you.
1111212211111222121.title: Jump off her foot

choices: Jump down to the babysitter
Wait upstairs with the boy
11112122111112221211.content:
The foot slams down with the fury of a collapsing mountain, and you're not under it. The floor reverberates with the impact, and the thunderous sound will be ringing in your head for weeks. You're in no condition to try another dodge, so if this woman wants to try again, you're done for.

The ringing changes in pitch, and you realise that it's not just in your head. No, that sounds like... a doorbell?

As if suddenly forgetting all about you, the woman strides over your prone form with practiced ease, her bare feet slamming down with the same titanic impact each time, the floor continuing to quake about you.

You crawl after her, through the doorway to find yourself on a landing, monumental wooden pillars marking what would for most people be a handrail, and you drag yourself across to peer between the gaps, down at the ground floor.

The woman completes her journey downstairs (at which point the vibrations cease, and you breathe a thankful prayer to whichever god is listening) and pauses only to slip on her shoes before opening the door. Revealed on the other side is a much younger female, smiling brightly and carrying a laptop bag in her hands. Presumably the two are talking quietly, but their roars carry up to you just fine, and you realise that this is the babysitter to look after Richard while his mother is out.

The ground rules are explained as the babysitter enters, and Richard's mother prepares to show her through to the kitchen. They will pass directly beneath your hiding spot, and it would be simplicity itself to drop down onto the head or shoulder of the babysitter as she walked by. At your size the distance shouldn't be any trouble, and once you're that close to a woman you should be able to bypass the 'stepping on an insect' phase and get straight to talking!

Of course, that's quite a jump. The more timid may prefer to wait upstairs until the woman comes to you...
11112122111112221211.title: Saved by the Bell

choices: Stay atop the babysitter's head
Climb down the babysitter
111121221111122212111.content:
Geronimo!

You leap between the bannisters towards the expansive forest of dark hair atop the babysitter's head. Winds rush past at your incredible velocities as you plunge the five or so feet to your destination, the surface not as springy as you'd hoped. No, the hair is rough and tears at your exposed skin, but at least you've broken no bones.

From here, you can look up into the awe-inspiring face of Richard's mother, the woman that not so long ago almost crushed you beneath her foot. She's less intimidating here, at chin height, but still your gut churns at the thought that she may notice you with those massive eyes and sweep you off with a fraction of her awesome power. You freeze, impossibly terrified by the slight possibility.

Your platform is unstable as the girl nods her head at comments made by the mother, and that combined with the risk - the tiny, tiny risk - of being spotted and swatted makes you wonder... Perhaps you may wish to abseil down this monument to femininity, using her hair to get down to her face or shoulder?
111121221111122212111.title: No Guts

choices: Climb into the babysitter's ear
Descend to the babysitter's laptop
1111212211111222121112.content:
You can barely fit more than a few strands of this thick, giant hair in your hands, but that does mean that these dark cables are more than strong enough to support your weight as you abseil down this woman's head.

Every move she makes sways you horrendously, alternately swinging out into the void, or smacking into the solidness of her skull with horrendous force. Yet you persevere, concentrating on your feet, not looking outwards or down. Below, an outcrop of whorled skin protrudes before your progress, the giant's ear. You could crawl in there to try talking to her, but it also serves as a trap; if she feels a bug crawling around, you may well be scratched to death before you can scream!

Beyond that, the heavy presence of that lap top bag strap over her shoulder. There, you'll be able to plan out a more long-term approach to communication...
1111212211111222121112.title: No Glory!

choices: Continue on to the ear
Change destination to the hand
Remain in the hair as long as possible
11112122111112221211121.content:
Down, down and further down, climbing in that direction without looking that way - it's so far! The roars of speech from this babysitter echo around you as you allow her thick hair to slide through your hands, and from the corner of your eye you can see the form of Richard rearing up as he meets with her. For a moment you fear that he might have seen you and wants to pluck you up in his fingers again, but there's no chance of your one-eight inch form being spotted now.

You out all thoughts of the larger world from your mind. All that matters is the ear, that fleshy protuberance that your feet even now kick down against. Okay, so you're on top of it now, but you still need to swing yourself over the edge and somehow begin climbing at a ninety-degree angle, while this girl still has an impossible mass of hair blocking your way.

Damn it! You stamp your foot in mild annoyance.

The world rocks as it responds, your climbing ropes effortlessly brushed away and threatening your grip. What was that? There's a brief flash of a thick, rugged wall that passes by with a loud breeze, and then it crashes into the ear, rubbing against it with the intensity of a steamroller. As you note the hardened platform scraping visible skin flakes clear to drift away, you realise that it is but a petite finger, summoned bu the minor itch you caused to sweep the hair back over the ear and have a good scratch.

Yes, the finger of a girl is a terrifying beast! You were lucky that she brushed you aside when she brought her hand to bear, otherwise you'd have been wiped from existence by her casual gesture.

So, it seems that you may have to be careful - too much movement and even your pathetic self will be felt and squashed! So, should you continue for the ear, knowing that? While it's near, you could go for her hand, instead, and try to catch her eye rather than get her to hear you.

Then again, perhaps climbing anywhere right now should be out of the question. Why not try and cling on just where you are, and wait until the girl lies down to sleep and try to get to the ear then. If you think that you can remain steady for a few hours...
11112122111112221211121.title: Earbound

choices: Go for a swim with the woman
Flee from her
11112122111112222.content:
You lay flat on your stomach, grip tight to the ruffled surface of the sandal, and brace yourself for take-off.

The woman moves off in time, but you have been waiting for so long by the time it happens that you are taken by surprise and almost fall off. Luckily, the pressure of the first step rams you down onto the base hard, ready to be bounced up again by the impact of landing.

So it is, with each step, that you are continually threatened to be thrown loose and crushed underfoot. Each time, by the barest of margins, you contrive to remain alive, clinging to the salvation that the sandal offers with all your might and luck.

You have no time to witness the passing of the outside world as the giantess goes about her business, your eyes screwed tight closed, your ears deafened by the repetitive booming of the walking.

The silence and stillness that greets you when you open your eyes causes you to gasp. You gulp in great mouthfuls of air, your journey having deprived you of that resource as much as awareness.

A sheer surface rises above you, taller even than the toes at your back. White sheen glistens, and the shadow of the woman leaning over above you adds weird patterns to the surface.

A rumbling grows from within the structure, almost as if a dam were being filled...

You glance down at the smooth, carpetless floor beyond the sandal's edge. This is a bathroom. The woman is going to have a bath.

What should you do? You could cling onto the woman's toe, to join her when she taes the plunge, or you could evacuate hurridly before she begins.

The first plan will allow you to swim closer to her face, possibly getting her attention and help, but does threaten to drown you at your pathetic, ant-like scale.

The second option leaves you high and dry - you have no idea what to do now, trapped at a miniscule size with no hope for aid at all.
11112122111112222.title: Bath-time

choices: Cling tight
Jump loose
111121221111122221.content:
Your body is all a-tingle as you reach out and grasp the nearest part of the wall of flesh that makes up the woman's toe. It recoils almost immediately, and for a moment you fear that she's felt you and will be crushing you like a bug very shortly.

But no, she's merely withdrawing her foot from her sandal, and you are being retracted with it. The velocity is on a par with her footsteps however, so you manage not to be shaken loose, even when the bare foot booms down on the bathroom floor.

You are almost recovered from the experience when the rushing cacophony of the filling bathtub is drowned out, and darkness envelops you. You scream as the foot rises again, but then find that light greets it at the apex of its climb, the giantess stepping out of her dropped denim trousers. Above you an eternity of bare flesh climbs up to become her leg, as naked as the rest of her monolithic body, but you have no time to admire her physique as she gets into the bath.

The foot rises higher than its ever gone before, and your own feet dangle below you as you cling tight to a ledge of skin defining the print of her toe's underside. A breeze hurtles past you, a terrifying storm to a person of your 1/8" height. As she carries her step forward, you cast your eyes downward to see an ocean fast approaching you, one dyed and bubbled by some cleansing liquids. If you were to remain holding on, you might be dragged down to the bottom by the force of impact, too deep to surface before you drowned. And who knows what effect bubble-bath will have on an insect like you? It alone might burn and kill you!

Your other option is to let go now, and free-fall to the water's surface, where you won't descend as far. Only problem with that - and one that you'd avoid if you held close to the giantess - is that the rest of her mass still hangs above you, and you may be crushed beneath her second foot, or even worse.

Decide quickly, as the woman is not slowing down!
111121221111122221.title: Taking the Plunge

choices: Swim upwards as fast as you are able
Bite the woman and have her carry you out
1111212211111222211.content:
You cling tight as the foot rushes down toward the surface of the bathwater. When it finally impacts, you find yourself unable to retain a grip and are shaken loose.

That doesn't mean that you are free, though. As the woman concludes her step to the bottom of the tub, your puny form is dragged along for the ride, carried by in her wake.

The swirling chaos of the water is hellish. The bubblebath seems quite toxic, and stings your eyes, which you clench closed while vortices swirl around you, each movement of the woman resulting in an Atlantic of liquid to be smashed in a different direction. The odd echoes of her collisions with the ceramic clash discordantly as they are carried to you, and you're going to need to take a breath very soon.

However, as you swirl in eddies of human creation, you know that you are at a considerable depth. Being only and eighth of an inch tall, it'll be quite a swim back to the surface, and you're not entirely sure that your lung capacity is up to it. And with a regular-sized woman sharing your personal space...

Of course! That's another option! If you were to bite the woman or similar, at least irritate her enough that she notices you, she might bring the leg, or foot, or whatever it is that you're resting against (opening your eyes would be a bad idea) out of the water to scratch at, providing you with a free trip! The downside of that plan would be that she'd see you as a bug and try to kill you, of course...
1111212211111222211.title: Taking the Plunge

choices: She sees you as humanoid
She sees you as an irritating bug
11112122111112222112.content:
Opening your mouth allows some of the bathwater in. You gag, but still chomp down on the flesh of the woman.

Water cascades around you, and once more you are subject to velocities as the skin you attacked is violently withdrawn. As you are shaken back and forth, you can hear the goddess' voice booming all around you:

"What the Hell?"

What the Hell indeed. Why are you being shaken about so much? How can she manage to move her leg so fast?

As stillness returns, a finger and a thumb pull the skin beneath you taut and eyes focus on you above, you twig. You're on one of her hands, and she was mildly alarmed by your bite. Congratulations; now she's seen you.

Ant-size, standing on the wrist of a woman between digits big enough to roll you flat, you meet the gaze of the vast blue eye above you. Your fate is up to her now.
11112122111112222112.title: Discovered

choices: She's fine.
She's mad
111121221111122221121.content:
The woman takes a long look at the tiny human she has pinched in her fingers.
"You're a human being, no way...", the woman says.
You try to remain as calm as possible and keep your composure, you are ready for her to ask the two question and they come almost immediately.
"How did you get so small and why are you in the bathtub with me?", the woman asks you.
You tell her the whole story about what happened. The woman looks at your amazed by your journey although you are sure she didn't get quite everything you said. You aren't sure whether the woman will be mad at you and she will be alright with you...
111121221111122221121.title: Found by Her

choices: Leave the bathroom & let the woman bathe in private.
Stay on the counter and look the other way.
1111212211111222211211.content:
The woman continues to stare at you, while you shiver nervously--either it really is nervousness or its the water that's making you cold. Either way, you await the woman speak to you.

"Well, despite your small size, what's important is that you are not hurt. I am truly amazed that you made it this far on my foot--even as I was getting in the bathtub," she says as you try to maintain your balance on her hand (remember it's soaked from the bathwater."

The woman continues, "I would like to continue my bath in privacy, please." Immediately, you nod your head, because you know that this woman is not screaming and dropping you in the water (because you're the size of a bug). She looks around the bathroom to find a place to set you down.

You look around the bathroom yourself & see some reasonable options:

She can set you on the floor and you can wait by a pair of her high heel pumps in the bedroom nearby.

She can place you on the bathroom counter, only if you promise not to look while she is taking her bath.

Which option do you choose?
1111212211111222211211.title: A Gentle Giantess

choices: It not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me
I'm John Stone. Urrr... can I leave now???"
11112122111112222112111.content:
You decide to wait by her high heel pumps in the bedroom nearby.
You hop off her hand into the ground and start walking out when she calls you
"wait!!!" You turn around.
"I don't even know your name."
You say...
11112122111112222112111.title: A ladies privacy

choices: Get out of the sink and peek at her again
stay in the sink
11112122111112222112112.content:
You decide to look away from her and stay on the counter.
She places you carefully on the counter, and you turn your head from the tub, trying not to see her.
But you cannot win the urge to see and look back.
She doesn't notice you for a while, then sees you peeking at her body.
"Why, you like my body?" She asks, laughing and spraying water and you to prevent you from seeing more.
The water hits you like a tsunami, and it slides you across the counter and into the sink.
You look back up.
She totally forgot about you and is taking a shower.
You can either...
11112122111112222112112.title: Stay on the counter and look the other way.

choices: Bite her toes to let her loose balance
stay and see what happens
1111212211111222211212.content:
You wait nervously for her reaction.
When you look up at her face, you see her face starring right at yours.
"You...dare..."She stutters.
Uh-oh. This cannot be good.
"YOU DARE SEE ME NAKED!!!" She screams.
She closes her hand tight so that you cannot breathe.
She then plunges her hand deep into the water.
Slowly. she presses you harder to the bottom of the tub.
Then, she switches the pressure.
She lets go of her hand, and instead, she presses you down with her massive feet.
She is about to stand up and give you the final blow.
Quick, you should...
1111212211111222211212.title: She's mad and decides to punish you

11112122111112222112121.content:
You bite her toes thinking it is worth a try.
She lets out a howl and slowly slides into the bathtub.
You are released by her feet, but crushed by her thighs.
You try to lift them but they are way to heavy.
You decide to wait for her to lift them herself.
Slowly, she lifts her thigh and pulls her out of the tub, taking you in the process.
She then searches the water for any trace of you.
Not seeing any drops of blood of evidence, she looks satisfied and goes to her room.
You fall off her thighs and drop to the ground below.
Unnoticed, she goes to her room stepping on your helpless body.
11112122111112222112121.title: Bite her toes to let her loose balance

choices: Knee
Shoulder
1111212211111222212.content:
You jump away, flailing your arms at the air as you float downward. Your tiny size slows your descent, and so the woman's foot overtakes you, smashing into the water well ahead of you and splashing drops larger than you in your direction.

You're still not landed by the time the woman's second foot steps into the tub, and breezes batter you away shortly before she sits down.

All is chaos in the aftermath of this, and you're lucky not to be compressed fully beneath her. As you bob to the surface, leaning against a warm expanse of flesh, you discover that you're near her...
1111212211111222212.title: Bobbing Along

choices: Walk towards the girl
Walk towards the boy
1111212211112.content:
One eighth of an inch tall, covered in two layers of sticky fluid - firstly, the spunk of Shelly's random date, secondly the spit of a young girl - you gaze up in awe at your captor.

Your brain tells you that it's just an ordinary ten-year-old boy, but the evidence of your eyes speaks otherwise. His massive muscles are clearly those of Atlas, capable of destroying you in an instant.

His grin is really disturbing, so you try to avoid making any sudden moves. Just as it looks like he's about to grab for you, there is a deafening thud behind you.

As the giant's eyes leave you, you feel free to turn and view the same sight.

It's the girl. She was running slightly slower than her companion, it would seem, and is out of breath. Each gasp from her mouth is a storm of terrifying potency.

The giantess storms forward, pointing at you.

"He's mine," she says.

Oh, shit.

Maybe, if you make some sort of move, you can settle this argument without them fighting and potentially crushing you..?
1111212211112.title: Enter Dilemma

choices: You jump from her hand to get away
You shout up at her, wanting to talk
11112122111121.content:
She may have spat upon you, she may have demanded that the boy shove you up his rear, she may have been the one that grabbed you in the first place, but you're hoping that there's some of that caring female nature in her. Yeah, she must just have been joking when she suggested your expedition to the arse! The boy just took it too far! Right?

She grins as you shuffle towards her across the uneven surface of the bed, which undulates as the boy shifts his weight in distress. "Hey! Come back here! I own you!" he bellows.

She kneels before you, bringing her terrifying countenance closer, and lays her palm before you. With a little effort you scamper up a finger, and are once more lifted to the heavens.

"You didn't do it, Dick," she tells the boy. "So he's mine. I'm taking him to my room."

Richard doesn't take this too well, diving across the room at her as she begins to leave. But he's clumsy, and overextends himself, crashing to the floor with a quake that you can still feel through the girl's body, at this tremendous height.

"Just you and me, now," she whispers, breath washing over you. At those words, you begin to worry.

The boy was an Atlas, but this girl is just as formidable to you, hardly a member of the gentler sex at all. Her age may not yet be measured in double figures, but she still holds such power over you that you regret putting yourself fully into her power.

The world passes by around you as she walks, but you keep your gaze fixed upwards, on her. You reacha decision.
11112122111121.title: Decision

choices: You discover a spider's web
Richard walks past
111121221111211.content:
Ant-sized, you're not going to stick around with this little girl long enough for her to pull your arms and legs off. So, at the earliest opportunity, you take a run along her finger and launch yourself into space.

Your negligible mass allows you to drift slowly toward the ground, but the backwash of air from the girl's progress as she walks on buffets you around. You cling to the wall - pink wallpaper - when it gets within reach, finding plenty of miniscule imperfections to hook yourself into.

The giantess continues on, lumbering away with tremendous noise.

Well, it's a long way to the ground, but on your climb you can wipe some of the gunk off of yourself. All in all, you're starting to feel hopeful for the first time in a good, long while. What else couldpossibly go wrong, eh?
111121221111211.title: Spoke Too Soon?

choices: The girl's mother wanted to know what was in her pocket
The boy wants to continue with their game
11112122112.content:
Covered in a coating of spit along with the spunk of Shelly's fun-mate from the night before, you descend into darkness as the girl hastily shoves her hand into a pocket, you trapped within her fist. Escape is impossible; at an eighth of an inch tall, each finger alone is far bigger than an elephant.

Your prison is as warm as it is dark, the girl's worry speaking as much through her sweaty palms as the loud breathing that carries through to you. You begin to whisper prayers, so sure are you that your death isn't far away.

The time that passes seems forever. At times the girl clenches tighter, pressing even more force upon you. You scream, not that anyone can hear.

A voice can be heard from outside, but its rumbling volume is difficult to identify. Age, gender; all indistinguishable. Go back tot he girl before she gets off and leaves you alone
11212122.content:
You look up to see if you've been noticed, but you find it hard to tell. Then again, since you can't see her face looking down at you, you can feel that she's in her own world.

Now then, getting down from her...

From where you stand, it's some seventy odd feet to the ground - that is, the seat that she is sitting on. Luckily, you have no trouble in climbing down the relatively coarse material she is wearing, and it is a matter of moments before you are down from her. But where now?

No one else is sitting next to her, but you're not sure how long this situation will go on for. From your position you don't get the best view of the bus, but you can't see anybody that you recognise. Anyone at all, in fact, at this time. It's pretty deserted.
11212122.title: On the Buses

choices: You venture out from under the seat
you wait until the bus stops again
112121221.content: You decide to wait for someone else to sit down beside her. You are sitting under the girls seat looking at her heeled sandals as the bus rumbles to a stop. Loud thuds rumble the floor as new passengers get on bus. peering out from under the seat you see a pair of gigantic feet taking the seat next to you. Now you are between two pair of huge female feet and the air around you is getting foul.
112121221.title: Going for a ride

choices: climb onto her shoe
wave your hands from the floor
1121212211.content: You want to know if the passenger is someone you know but you can't see from here. Carefully you ease out from under the seat and around her pretty feet and look up. It's Marsha your girlfriend. You and her are not on good terms right now but you figure she is the only that can help now.
1121212211.title: A New Hope

choices: She goes home
She goes to another party
11212122111.content: Figuring she will never see you down here you decide to climb on her shoe. Her toenails are painted red and you have always found her feet to be sexy. She is wearing black sandals with a six inch heel. Climbing onto her big toe you have a feeling you may fall off and get crushed while she walks. So you climb a little further up her foot. Just as you do the bus once agian rumbles to a stop. Marsha gets up and starts walking toward the door. As she takes gigantic steps you start to slide down the side of her foot. Grabbing hold of one of the straps you slide right under her foot. Luckily for you the height of the heel and your current height there is just enough room to fit under her arch. Looking up you are face to face with the arch of your girlriends foot. She has been dancing all night and the sweat from her foot is saturating you body. The smell is overwhelming but now you are trapped and have no choice but to smell her feet.
11212122111.title: Trapped

choices: you get there attenshun
you are too small to be noticed.
112121221112.content: SLUMBER PARTY, she mumbles drunkenly, HOORAY. gah ,you think what was that roar?, it overloaded your sneses. Suddenly BOOM BOOM she gets off the bus! she walks to a door where there is a constant painful roar. BOOM gah you think it is like a 11.9 earthquake each time she steps. you decide to climb her to get her attention. wow that is a long way down if i fall you think. suddenly she starts to dance to the music. she kicks her feet high and you go flying. great you think now i have further to fall. suddenly a bunch of girls (including your girlfriend) start to drink. wow you think as you fall this must be all the girls at campus. LETS BOOGIE, says one. after exposure to those words you realize the roars are words. ah the fall ended due to your tiny size you land unharmed on the dance floor. gah you say as a toe as big as a continent lands next to you you go flying a few miles, or inches away. wait a minute i did not shrink again did i? yes i did you hink when you realize that everything is bigger. i have to go and get there attention.
112121221112.title: She goes to another party

112122.content:
Tempting as it is to get inside the cinema sized bag before you, you don't know what could be in there. No, you're much better off here.

You were still thinking that thought when the woman picked up her bag and walked over to the bus, stepping on you in the process.
112122.title: Missed Opportunity

choices: You run away from the tree as fast as you can
You take cover between the roots and wait it out
1122.content:
Your current surrounding may be creeping you out, but what choice do you have? There is no one around to give you a lift, and getting home or to the university on foot at your present size? Forget it. Besides, you are still exhausted from the mountain climbing and dodging those giants. So you decide not to waste any more energy, but rather settle down for the night. Tomorrow morning, there should be enough people around that you may get help or at least a ride home.
         Having determined that, you start exploring your surroundings. Currently, you are standing more or less in the middle of the doorstep. Defenitely not a good place. When guests eventually leave the party, you'd be stomped to death. Besides, it is too exposed as this is one cold night out here.
         You start walking along the wall of the building as you come across a crack in it. Had you been at your normal size, you would never have noticed it, but now it seems to be a gaping maw. While you are still gazing at it, you notice some movement inside and a disgusting smell. Roaches! You should have known they'd be around such a place. You have seen very few roaches in your life, but you know that they are bigger than half an inch. And they would certainly have no trouble eating up such a small, soft midnight snack.
         Looking for an alternative to this less than welcoming house, you notice a tree standing not far from here. It is surrounded by a small patch of earth, but somehow, the city has forgotten to plant grass. But since keeping the city clean isn't a top priority, many leaves and broken sticks surround it (together with the usual garbage like hankies, a can of Coke, and some scraps of paper).
         As you were not prepared for a night of camping, you have little choice but to dare the patch of earth. It doesn't take you long to find some scraps of a used paper hanky that would make great sheets for you. The insects you encounter are even smaller than you are, and seem to be even more afraid of you than you are of them. Once you are sure that there is no imminent danger, you settle down for the night next to the tree's roots.
         You wake up as the sun is already shining down on you. The common noise of the city is surrounding you and movement is everywhere. The night has been mediocre. It was safe, but the ground was hard and cold and you are feeling a bit stiff. As you start stretching your body you notice some movement around the tree. Some big monsters are jumping around picking at the ground. You are shocked when you realize that it's just some sparrows. Normally not even an annoyance, but now a deadly threat to you. They haven't noticed you yet, but what will you do?
1122.title: A New Day, A New Chance

choices: The sparrow has a family, and you have been invited for breakfast
The sparrow is alone, and you are about to get some insights about it
11221.content:
You panic and just try to get away. This turns out to be not to good an idea. A sudden rush of wind throws you off your feet. Before you can recollect yourself, you feel yourself lifted and thrown up, as the sparrow picks you up. You land on its rough tongue, which is wet and sticky with its saliva. Everything is darker, but you can still see some things. Then the sparrow swallows.
         You are being pushed to the back of the beak and there is nothing you can onto. The sensation is rough and painful and you feel as if you were being torn apart. After only a short slide through a rather narrow tube (still more than large enough to let you through), you land in a pool of liquid in what seems to be a leathery sack. In spite of there being no light source, you are able to see that your prison has rather smooth walls and is some three or four yards long. Its entire floor is covered by a hip- deep pool of sticky saliva and a headless cockroach is lying at the other end. As you further examine the saliva, you notice some stone fragments that are also there.
         The air is stale, but there isn't any hint at stomach acids or anything. Judging from what little you know about birds, this must be the sparrows crop. So you are just another meal awaiting final processing. Somehow, you don't like that idea, but there is little you can do about it but wait for the sparrows next move (besides gulping down some more food stuff, that is). What will happen next?
11221.title: Bad Move. Sparrows Score One

choices: Jump through the hole
Stay in the nest and hide among the swallows
112211.content:
Suddenly, you feel as if you're being lifted up through the tube you came in and out of the sparrow's beak.
"Finally, some luck!" shout, thinking that the swallow hadn't liked the taste of minature human. But you find that you had spoken too soon. As you are about to emerge along with the headless cockroach and other insect parts, you realise that you were just about to be transfered into another beak. It was squeeling as if it were on six-channel imput. The noise surrounds you and it is so overwhelming that you feel you are just about to fall into a coma from that migrane that was developing. But desperately, you cling onto the swallows beak and avoid being regurgitated into another.
You've made momma angry. The bird furiously shakes it's head, trying to get your strong grip loose from it's beak. It shreeks and again, like symbols crashing yet ten times the frequency, you hear that horrible cry and more from the swallows. The sparrow shakes it's head even more furiously and suddenly your grip fails. You fall hard onto the ground of the nest and take a while to recover. Luckily, you landed behind one of the young swallows and you aren't in view of the sparrow. And you see a hole, your only escape.
Hurry! make your choise! The Sparrow is searching her nest for you. She's very angry! What will you do?
112211.title: Regurgitation

choices: Squirm!  You must escape!
Give in, plumpen your predator...
1122112.content:
A plump little swallow chick catches wind of you, eyes locking onto your small form with an obvious eagerness, already stretching its neck with its little maw screeing desperately. Mother hears this, and scoops you up oncemore, depositing your feet nearly into the wet beak of the chick.

The chick instantly swallows, yawning it's beak up and over your ankles smoothly, and with a wet splorch your calves begin to quickly slip into and stretch its thin neck. It bobs its head up along your calves furiously, sucking down your legs in several pecking upward motions. You squirm, but to no avail, as your hips slooooorp past its little beak, tilting its head back to gobble you up...

Your navel vanishes into the hot little body, then pectorals, chest gone. Your arms above your head, light is drowned out by darkness and heat as the hungry little bird gobbles the rest of you up. It closes its beak, determined to keep its prize down, belly swollen wonderfully by your tasty body. You're forced to curl up, soon to make a rather fat bird out of the chick...
1122112.title: Gobbled!

choices: Head towards the sidewalk, then to the bar?
Take a shortcut through the lawn to the bar?
11221121.content:
Being eaten by a baby bird was not on your agenda today. Determined, you start to wriggle and writhe for all you're worth inside the tiny baby bird's stomach.

You kick out with your feet, you flail your arms and constantly keep in motion. You swear the baby sparrow starts chirping louder, but with all of its brothers and sisters, adding to the symphony, you can't be sure.

After squirming for what seems like forever, you feel a sudden motion. Faster than you can reason, you're out in the fresh air. Apparently, the baby bird's dinner (read: you) didn't agree with it. Unfortunatly, you're in a nest with it's siblings. The momma seems to have taken off to find other juicy bits for her young.

A small beak, well humongous beak in your perspective snaps shut just missing you. No way you want to go back to that birds accomodations. You only have one choice, really.

You tense up and leap off the nest. Being the size of an ant means your landing after going down what seemed like a 500ft fall, didn't even phase you.

Now you look around and see that you have a problem. Several actually. One, you need to hed back to the party and find that ring. See if you can figure out a way to make yourself bigger. And Two, you're outside, the size of an ant and all alone in the middle of a forest of grass; probably full of things which would want you for dinner.

What do you do?
11221121.title: Tight quarters

choices: The girl drops something, and spots you
They are waiting to cross the road.  Jump on?
112211211.content:
You can't help wishing that you had a machete to help you in your short trip to the pavement. Short to normal sized people, maybe two steps, but to you it still takes several minutes, pushing through unimaginably tall vegetation and avoiding the rotted remains of dead insects.

Eventually the jungle gives way to a vast plain of grey concrete. Now the faiint noise that you had heard previously is more obvious, and rushing blurs ahead of you appear to be the source.

Cars.

You'd just gotten over the size of PEOPLE in this crazy giant world, but compared to cars they're nothing. You find it hard to comprehend how something so vast could move so fast.

So mesmerised are you by this spectacle that you fail to notice the approach of two people. You only spot them when they are practically upon you, the nearest foot crunching only a couple of your feet away from you. The impact gets your attention.

The birds were big, the people in the bar were bigger, but seeing a foot this close up and this stationary is something new.

It (and its paired colleague) is wearing a sandal the height of you, which isn't surprising given the hot summer's day. The titanic toes wriggle a little, each movement enough to crush you several times over. You follow the shapely, tanned leg upwards with your eyes, where it becomes covered by a red dress. A 'short' red dress. Any more than that you cannot see.

Smiling despite yourself, you turn the other pair of feet. They too wear sandals, but the white dree is much longer, ankle length by your judgement. That's not what bothers you though. It takes you several seconds before you realise what's different.

These feet are even bigger. Half again the size of the original feet, you struggle to come up with new words that mean big.

This is a woman, and the smaller feet belong to a girl (her daughter?). To think that you had thought of her legs as shapely...
112211211.title: Journey into Confusion

choices: She shows you to her mother
She keeps you a secret and takes you to school with her
1122112111.content:
There's another impact behind you, though you're experienced enough by now to know that it's something a lot smaller than even the girl's foot. You turn slowly, all too aware that it could be another bird. What you actually see is something of a surprise.

It is light brown in colour, in form a cone that starts out as thick as your leg but soon widens until it is some four times your height. When you see white liquid leaking out from the large end, you recognise the alien object. An ice-cream cone.

You can't remember when you last ate, so right now you're not picky. You rush over to the food, breaking several small chunks off with your hands. It tastes as you know cones taste, but at your size the consistency is harder - you really have to work your teeth to get it down your throat. But it's worth it, it feels good in your stomach.

Then a shadow falls over you and you freeze, your mouth locking mid chew. Looking over your shoulder, you can see the smaller pair of feet turned to face you, and the legs to which they are attached bending, as an arm reaches over you to pick up the ice cream. The girl wants it back.

'No! Leave it where it is, it's covered in germs!' shouts her mother, audible even over the tirade of the traffic.

The hand halts, and retracts from the spoiled food. But the damage has been done. You have no time to react before a thumb and a finger grasp you roughly and tar you from your place, hoisting you with dreadful power into the air. You almost choke, and that's without the rush of movement and the pressure exerted on your fragile form byt he digits.

Looking up into the face of the girl, you have no doubt now as to her youth. Her age in years surely can't be counted in double figures yet. Her smooth face breaks into her grin, and you prepare yourself for the end.
1122112111.title: Cold Comfort

choices: 'Ew, throw it away right this instant!'
'Let me have a look...'
11221121111.content:
Proud of her capture, the girl shakes you up and down in the air to get the attention of her mother. Thus far, you have to say that this is your worst experience of your new size. The rushing gusts, the rollercoaster-beating velocities, the awful pressure of the finger and thumb -

But what will Mommy say? She wasn't too keen on her daughter picking up a discarded ice cream cone, will she think that you too are riddled with germs? Or will she want a closer inspection herself? Once the shaking stops, your eyes finally focus on the face that is the sky. It's young, certainly no more than thirty, and framed by short dark hair. The yes squint at you curiously, and then you notice an intake of breath as the unlipsticked lips prepare to form themselves around the words that could be either your salvation or your death.
11221121111.title: "Look Mommy!"

112211211111.content:
Your view of the woman's face is suddenly obscured by her hand, moving in a blur too fast for you to clearly see. The further rocking of the world around you is the last thing that you are aware of - things go too fast. The last thing to go through your mind - after the floor when you hit it - is the back of your skull as the woman grinds your fallen form beneath her heel.
j
112211211111.title: Doomed!

choices: Wait it out
Think of a way to escape
112211211112.content:
More words wash over you in a storm that you find it hard to make sense of. Then you are falling, and landing on a soft surface. Taking a few moments to look around, taking in the warm pulsing beat beneath your feet and the five towers around you. You are in the woman's hand, and her face is still looking down at you, a smile on her lips and an interested stare twinkling in her dark brown eyes.

Then the landscape beneath you is funnelling, and tilting upwards. Try as you might to hold on, you slide down the woman's palm and into the dark recesses of her handbag. All light is eclipsed as she snaps it shut.

What now? You could wait around to see what she has in store for you, or you could try to escape - you're not sure how you're gonna go about that, but you've got plenty of time to think.
112211211112.title: Bagged

choices: Go along with her crazy scheme
Escape while she isn't looking
1122112111121.content:
In time, the bag opens and tilts, throwing you out into the world again, where the light scalds your eyes. You have been too long in the dark. You bounce and roll, landing on a dark wooden table. Getting to your feet, you see the woman sitting down on a chair at the table, looking down at you with a smile on her face. Now she is wearing make up, her lips a deep red, and has her long dark tresses tied back.

'My name is Glumdalclitch.' she says, with what even you recognise as a Welsh accent.

Glumdalclitch? Wasn't that somebody from 'Gulliver's Travels'? You stare up at her, even more confused now.

'Ah, I see that the name means something to you. Presumably you have read the book. It is all true. Well, I know for a fact that the Brobdingnagian section is true, the rest could indeed be a work of fiction. Anyway, following the loss of her little man, the little nurse became determined to followhim out into the world so that she could marry him, as she had always intended to do. Of course, Brobdingnag is completely cut off from the rest of the world because of the inhospitable rocks. Only a boat to the scale of Gulliver's race of Europeans could bypass them in safety. So, the little nurse dedicated her life to finding a way of reducing herself in size. Not just for the sake of leaving her land, but also for Gulliver's sake. He had been reluctant to marry her before, but if they were the same size, he would have to agree, yes?

'So, for many years the little nurse worked with the sorcerers of the king's court, and in time she bound a ring with the power to control the wearer's size. Stealing away from court at the dead of night, she escaped in a small boat that she had constructed herself. She was soon picked up by a British ship and, knowing enough of English from her discussions with Gulliver, was able to get passage to England.

'She never found Gulliver, but did in time find for herself a man with whom she was content to settle down and have children. Alas, calamity struck, and the ring was stolen from her, but she didn't care, because she was content to stay the size that she was. Over the generations this tale has been told to her descendants, and each has been aware of their ancient heritage, though less have believed as the centuries crawled on. I believe. I spent years tracking the ring of my several times great grandmother, even moving here with my daughter when I learnt that it was in America. You found it, didn't you?'

You nod, still trying to digest all of this information.

'It's gone now of course? My researches have told me that the ring will eventually choose a host for its powers, shrinking you down to its own size and ceasing to exist itself.'

So you now have the ring's power? maybe this won't be so bad.

'Don't get too excited. You can't control that power, and neither can I. But I still need you. The ring was more than a mass reducer, it was also a compass, that would point unerringly back towards Brobdingnag. So you can lead me back there.

'The blood of giants runs in my veins, so I deserve better than this. Back in the land of my ancestors, I can find a way to restore myself to my proper size, the proper size for normal people, and then tell my countrymen of ways in which they can travel the world, and bring you vermin under proper control.'

She's grinning now, and not looking at you. Ranting, she believes that it would be a good thing for a race of giants to take over the world. Doesn't sound too good to you. It would be better for the world if you didn't help her to go home. Though now that the ring is gone, this is the only hope that you have to restore your own size. But can you really risk sacrificing the world to save your own hide? If you do get to Brobdingnag and manage to become restored, you'll still be tiny in that land.

Well, if you planned on escaping, this will be the only opportunity, while 'Glum' (if that is her real name) is spouting out her mealomaniacal plans for teaching the giants how to build planes and helicopters, suitably distracted. If you want to help her with her plan, you have to do nothing but wait for her to finish.
1122112111121.title: Legacy of Glumdalclitch (more exposition, sorry!)

choices: The giant civilisation is the same as it was when Gulliver discovered it
Society among the giants has advanced parallel to our own technologically
11221121111211.content:
It is some time later. You sit in the palm of Glum's hand as she stands with her daughter at the prow of a ship, looking out across the oceans. There are other ships following, you were told, but this ship, the flagship, is of course at the head of the formation. Finding crews willing to take the vessels to Brobdingnag was surprisingly easy; you hadn't realised how many sailors were devotees of GTS.

You cannot see much from your position, but you are apparantly guiding the ship. Every little motion you make, no matter how inconsequential it may seem to you, is a sign guiding back towards the land of the Ring's birth. Sounds like a bucket of pigshit to you, but given your current circumstances it's not too unbelievable.

More time passes, and the ships drop anchor off the coast, of Brobdingnag presumably. Glum congratulates you, the first words that she has spoken for the entire voyage, and then is first into the boat to shore. Her daughter accompanies you, apparantly not understanding what is going on, as do several burly sailors, expectant looks on their faces and large calibre guns in their hands. It seems that they're taking no chances.

When the main expedition, some twenty men and women, have made it to the beach, it isn't long until you find out whether the preparations were adequate...
11221121111211.title: In the main, a Rediscovery of Brobdingnag

choices: The gods decide to take you all to the 'king'
The gods decide to ignore what the little people say
112211211112112.content:
The giants here were as unprepared for your arrival as you were for their size. They are huge! Standing ten times taller than a normal person, to you they are above such crude terms as 'giant'. These are truly gods!

They were lying down, enjoying the sun in their bikinis and trunks (depending on their gender), until one of them noticed the tiny boat approaching. Now Glum's party of giants is surrounded by half a dozen confused - yet tanned - gods.

'I demand to see the king at once!' Glum shouts, raising the hand that she doesn't hold you in to the sky. 'I am of the blood of Glumdalclitch!'
112211211112112.title: Beach Bums

choices: Try to escape
Bide your time
11221121112.content:
The girl smiles at you, then puts a finger of her other hand to her lips and says 'shh'. She should follow her own advice, you reckon - the noise that she makes sounds to you like an elephant making love. In volume, of course - your mind is once again making up comparisons to things that you've never experienced. And at the most inappropriate times. Your brain should be thinking up cunning stratagems of escape, or what to say to this girl to get her to let you go, not pondering pachyderm procreation.

It doesn't matter though, as you are quickly stuffed into the breast pocket of the girl's dress. Thankfully it is empty, and you can see enough of the outside world through the stitching of the threads to get an idea of where you're going. Bouncing against the girl's chest as she walks is mildly annoying, but surely better than taking a ride on her foot. At least all is soft here.

You guess from what you can make out of the journey that your ultimate destination is the local school. Is that somewhere that you really want to go, to have this girl show you off to her friends, or play with you on her own? You could attempt an escape from this cloth prison now, but where would you go? For one thing, the ground must be some four hundred and fifty feet below you, and the girl IS walking... In your current predicament, you are safe for now - you could hang on in here and make a break for it later, when it'll be easier to do so.
11221121112.title: "My Secret!"

choices: Climb
Cut
112211211121.content:
Okay, you're not in the most level of places, but you've got to think. You could climb out of the top; there are plenty of handholds and a clear exit, but there are two problems with this. Firstly, you're quite a way up, with quite a way to fall, and secondly, your captor could quite easily spot you.

On the other hand, you could try and pick a few stitches free and drop out of the bottom. You do have a swish Swiss army knife in your own pocket - you've never found any situation before where you've needed it, but this could be just the situation that your father gave it to you for. The same height problem applies, if a little decreased, but it may take you a while to cut through - who knows what may have happened in that time?
112211211121.title: Extrication

choices: She shows you to her friends
She wants you all to herself
112211211122.content:
Rocking around in your fabric prison, bashing against the girl's chest, you have plenty of time to think. At this time of day, you're more than likely being taken to school. What could happen if you are taken there? This girl could show you to her friends, or she could keep you all to herself. It's probably best to hope for the latter; you've more chance of persuading a lone girl to help you than to shout down a mob of hysterical girls at your size. Hope and pray...

Ten minutes or so later, the sunlight above you is blacked out as probing fingers descend. Already bruised and battered, these fingers knock you around a bit (those fingernails are terribly hard!) before gripping ahold of you once again, squeezing you horribly until you are sure that your ribs will splinter and your torso will explode.

Then you are yanked at startling speed from the pocket, towards whatever fate she has ordained for you. You don't really care now, just so long as she lets you go...
112211211122.title: Enjoying the Wild Ride?

choices: stay still
try to avoid being touched
1122112111221.content:
Soon you are lying on your back in the palm of the girl-goddess' hand, terrified feelings washing over you as you behold the monstrous faces of three eight-year olds gazing down at you in wonder.

Their breath washes over you in hot waves, and you wonder what they'll do once they've gotten over their initial shock.

'Can I touch him?'

The voice belongs to the blonde-haired giantess. Do you want to assent to her request, or try to avoid her probing finger?
1122112111221.title: Shown

choices: Hitch a ride on your way home
Ignore the giantesses and make your way back to the bar
1122112112.content: Cars are rushing past, and the pair seem to be waiting for a break in order to cross. Should you want to get across, hitching a lift would be your best bet. In order to get home you would have to cross at some point. On the other hand, the bar is on this side of the road, and that's where this all started. You'll have to think fast, before your opportunity is gone.
1122112112.title: Destination?

choices: Go with the mother
Jump onto the daughter's foot
11221121121.content: Both giantesses have the means to transport you, it's just a matter of choosing whether you want to risk the wriggly toes of the girl or the bigger stepping (and therefore rougher ride) of the woman.
11221121121.title: Youth or Age?

choices: Jump
Stay
112211211211.content:
Hunger Pain

As you scale the sandal, you are astounded. You had thought that the girl was huge, but compared to this giantess she's a child. Which she is, of course.

You aren't even as tall as the big toe of this foot, and as you lay your hand upon it to steady yourself you see how tanned it is. Or how pale you are, you're not sure which. You squeeze yourself between the two warm walls where the strap of the sandal divides the biggest toe from the others. There is no smell here, somewhat surprisingly, the strap is something to hold onto in case of an emergency and you can't help but feel a little turned on at the feeling of these humongous extremities around you. You look up, but see only darkness within the folds of the dress that lie above the pillars that are the ankles.

Then there is silence where before was the constant drone of passing vehicles. This is soon followed by a lurch as the foot sets of on its journey. Through the violence of the foot lifting and dropping and the noise of the heel of the sandal slapping against the woman's heel you think you can make out the girl skipping ahead. Looks like you made the right choice of transport.

Soon your unwitting helper has taken you across the road, but here is no respite. She continues walking. Fighting the waves of 'foot sickness' coursing through you (you must be the first person to experience it, you think) you can basically tell that she's walking in the direction opposite that of where you were heading. You can also tell that you are hungry, mainly by the fact that there's nothing in your stomach to be thrown up by this journey. You're not going to start eating this woman's foot, so you'd better find some sustenance, and fast!

You could risk taking a jump from here before you're taken too far away from your home, although there's a good chance of being squashed in the process. If you did though, you could probably scavenge some discarded food from the ground on your way home - this isn't a tidy district.

Alternatively, this woman will have to eat at some time, so you could stay with her, ignore your hunger and wait for a chance to grab a few crumbs for yourself.
112211211211.title: Hunger Pains

choices: Head off home
Wait for a lift
1122112112111.content:
The two stomp back on their way, unaware of the lightening of their load. The streets seem fairly quiet now, excluding the roar of the traffic. You can't see any other giants approaching, and ahead of you you can spot the discarded remains of a packet of chips. You tuck in with gusto; in your ravished state they taste like ambrosia itself.

Once you've gorged yourself to a suitable state of satisfaction (and stowed some food with you in case you feel hungry again later), you get your bearings. You know exactly where your home is now, and there are no more roads to cross (or at least, there are ways around the road crossings that just make your journey longer - at regular size you didn't usually care). It's just a matter of distance. Should you make your way there yourself, or risk another vomit-inducing ride?
1122112112111.title: The Mean Streets

choices: Fran is going to class
Fran is going to meet some friends
11221121121112.content:
For several minutes you wait, safe with your back to the wall, as the world goes by. Many, many giants pass you by, on their way to work or school, wherever they have a pressing need to be. You refrain from jumping onto any of their feet, even those of the attractive women, knowing that they're not heading where you want to go. You keep your eyes fixed on one horizon, the one opposite the direction in which university lies, looking for a familiar face.

Not too much time has passed before your hopes are fulfilled. Seeing first the face, and then the rest of the body as she gets closer, you get yourself ready for the necessary run and jump. It's going to be hard scaling a moving target, and evn harder to run through this crowd first.

Francesca, your saviour, you know from a mathematics class. She is peruvian, and an openly talking woman who can go a bit far when drinking. She is, however, a good friend. In fact, you can't think of anybody that knows her that doesn't like her. She wouldn't have been your first choice for a ride, or a potential help, but you'll take what you can get.

She is currently wearing a black woolen cardigan over a low cut purple top, and a dark ankle length purple skirt decorated with orange flowers. Over her feet she is wearing open-toed black mules, and over one shoulder she has her black fluffy handbag. Her other hand holds a ring binder, so you can deduce fairly happily that she is on her way to the uni.

As she gets closer, close enough that you can't see beyond her knees and can hear the flapping noise of her footwear hitting her heel as she puts her foot down on each step, you begin your run. Only one man comes between you, but his shoes miss you by quite a wide margin, and soon you are jumping for the edge of the shoe as it hits the ground. Your timing is spot on.

At the toe end, the mule is half the height that it is at the heel. It's still just over a head taller than you, however. Not being the most athletic of people, your hopes of leaping atop it in a single bound were hopelessly optimistic, but your fingertips do grip the edge. The foot takes off again before you can pull yourself up, but against the odds you keep yourself there. On the next impact you take advantage of the brief stillness to scuttle up and take shelter near the towering, dark skinned toes. Using your previous experience of foot riding, you manage to find a relatively comfortable spot, nuzzled close beneath the paler undersides of the toes, where you can lie down and try to contain the food that you have not long ago ingested. The warmth is nice.

The world swirls around you, no hope of you discerning where you're going this time. Instead you try to think, try to come up with a plan of action for contacting Fran. You could just wait until she looks down at her toes, but that could be forever. Plus, of course, she's one of those women that can't keep her feet still when sitting down, either rotating them around on their ankles when she crosses her legs, or slipping them out of their shoes to stretch them and wiggle her toes. Neither of those bodes well for your chances of survival. Alternatively, you could be more pro-active, and try climbing, or get off her completely when you get to her destination.

Thinking of which, you still aren't exactly sure where Fran's going...
11221121121112.title: Going My Way?

choices: Get off now
There's no rush
112211211211122.content:
It's quite a relief when fran stops walking. Underneath her toes, you were getting a little hot. In more ways than one...

You have a quick glance around, nestled between two room sized toes. Aside from the warm flesh around you, you can pick out the carpet that this place is decorated with. The unmistakeable flying fish motif, with its unique collection of stains, tells you immediately that you are in the Flying Fish, one of the student bars on campus.

The feet clustered around nearby tell you that Fran is at a table. meaning that she may cross her legs at any time. Do you want to get off before she does so?
112211211211122.title: Time For A Quick Drink

choices: Go to School
Stay with this mysterious woman
1122112112112.content:
You don't notice much of the passing scenery, too concerned are you with holding onto where you are and trying to ignore your stomach's demands. When the seismic disturbance stops, you almost think that you've finally gone insane. But it's only the woman stopping walking.

Shaking your head, you peer out between her toes. You have been taken to just outside the gates of a school, which the girl is running through to join with other similarly titanic children. If you wanted to get off this sandal, now would be your only chance. But why would you want to?

You could go into the school, where there is sure to be some food. You don't know how long it's going to be before your ride is going to indulge herself. The only danger would be the large number of large boys and girls that would quite happily pull your arms and legs off, and then only if they fail to accidently step on you.

It would be much safer to stay here with the mother. If it is her mother. You realise that you don't know what relation they are - she could be the girl's mother, an older sister or even just a baby sitter. The only way to find out would be to ride her foot to its journey's end. It's going to be a rough ride, but if you survive there should eb some food, or at least someone mature to get help from.
1122112112112.title: School Drop

choices: Against all the odds, you make it to the steps
Someone spots you
11221121121121.content:
It is with some trepidition that you venture down from the sanctuary of the sandal, and not a second has passed before it is off again, and you are alone.

You pass through the gates to the school yard, a vast distance apart. On the other side, a nightmare of feet, running everywhere, or even skipping. Huge orbs, made of brightly coloured rubber, impact off the ground as well, and your chances of surviving to cross this hellish mile to the towering steps that climb into the heavens towards the school itself look slim. But try you must - your ride has gone, and your stomach is growling loud enough to be heard even over the sounds of these children at play.
11221121121121.title: Schoolyard

choices: Try to go with the girl
Go for the ramp
112211211211211.content:
You don't quite know how you avoid being crushed to death by the children in the playground, but somehow, you manage to get to the three short steps that lead to the schoolhouse door.

Well, for a normal-sized kid they're short. For a half-inch-tall college student, they're impregnable cliffs of doom. You do see a ramp a good distance away, but you'll have to cross in front of the steps in order to get it.

You are pondering your options when an enormous shadow passes beside you, and drops with earthquake-like force. You fall to the ground, and look up at an immense girl, probably a fifth grader, who has decided to sit down at the base of the steps, just a couple feet away from you at your scale. This could be your path inside--or you could try the ramp.
112211211211211.title: Decisions

choices: Climb the laces
Wait for crumbs
1122112112112111.content:
You edge closer to the sneaker, aware that, at any moment, it could move to crush you. The laces trail on the ground for quite some distance, clearly undone. Presumably the girl has sat down in order to tie them again.

You spare a moment to cast a glance up at her, to see if she's looking down at the moment. But no, all that way up, she's not paying attention to her footwear. You're not sure, but it looks like she is eating a sandwich or something.

Now's your chance; you could make it to her laces and climb aboard her without her noticing. But she is eating, and you are hungry. You could wait around for some crumbs. If you do, though, there won't be much time before she decides to tie her laces, and then the chances of you getting onto her without being seen will be shot. It's up to you.
1122112112112111.title: Snacks and Laces

choices: Fall inside her shoe
Manage to hang on and continue climbing
11221121121121111.content: You begin climbing the laces of the girls sneakers, However the foot begins to tremble from a sudden movement of her crossing her legs causing you to
11221121121121111.title: Shoe Climbing

choices: Stay in the shoe
Climb out
112211211211211111.content:
You fall inside her shoe. It is dark, but thankfully not very smelly.

You decide that your safest bet would be to
112211211211211111.title: Shoe'd

choices: She doesnt hear you
She hears you
112211211211211112.content: Your working out has payed off alot since you managed to keep a strong grip on her shoe laces and continued to climb up. Its wearing you out and you cant take it much longer. The girl sets her sandwich down on her lap to take a drink and you accidently let go falling onto the surface of the half-eaten sandwich. You begin to take peices of bread off and eat them, Your hunger begins to gradually fade off. When all of a sudden the sandwich rumbles beneath your feet! The sandwich is being lifted. Turning your head back you see the girl opening her enourmous mouth about ready to take a bite! You fall back and try screaming at her not to eat you. You begin to move closer and realize your adventure is probably going to end here now. You are going be nothing more than a mere peice of meat in her lunch, Ground to dust between those giant huge molars of hers and nourish her young growing body. You try one last time to get her attention by yelling your down here!
112211211211211112.title: Lunch was never this tough to find

choices: You succeed in dodging the teeth
You get crushed
1122112112112111121.content:
You shout at the top of your lung, but it is no use. Without any delay, without any hesitation, the sandwich, you aboard, travels towards the widening hole.

         You lose your balance as everything comes to a sudden stop. Recovering, you look up to see her gigantic teeth come falling down towards you. As you are paralyzed by fear, they hit the sandwich just 2 meters in front of you, followed by the lips. You hear an enormous tearing sound and the ground shakes. Then the sandwich moves again, this time in the opposite direction, revealing that the plain that had been in front of you is gone, replaced by a cliff topped with glistening humidity. Thin ropes of saliva connect it to a set of enormous, faint pink lips, before dissipating just moments later. Those lips start changing their shape, and deep squishing sounds can be heard as the girl chews up the bite.

         You try to think up a way out of here. Should you jump? Should you run? Won't you be hurt by the drop? Maybe if you tried shouting again? Thousands of ideas, problems, thoughts mingle in your head, creating a chaos that keeps you from getting a clear idea of what to do next. Panic clouds your judgement, so that you can't do anything but lay still while the motion of the face stops, followed by a thundering, wet sound.

         Your posture hasn't changed by the time the maw opens up ones again. Only tiny fragments between the teeth remain of the piece of sandwich she has just swallowed. The gigantic red cavern glistens with humidity as you start moving again. Light is reflected in miriads of colors from a string of saliva connecting the roof with the eagerly waiting tongue. The temperature rises as does the humidity while you enter the girl's mouth. The ring of white boulders quickly disappears behind your head, replaced by a roof, the structures in which remind you of fish bones.

         Then you jarr to a halt and things get dark as the mouth closes far behind you. The ground shakes and jumps as the teeth bite down into the bread, cutting it apart with a tearing sound. Looking around, you can see the edge of your raft touching the flesh her teeth are grounded in. As expected, there is no way out, no way to escape. In a gesture showing your helpless state, you start shouting for help again.

         The ground suddenly falls down beneath you, sending your stomach flying, only to stop again. Then the edge you have been looking at moves in between the now parted teeth. As they crash down against the sandwich, there is no more denying that she won't hear you. All there is left for you is to try and somehow survive this.
1122112112112111121.title: In you go

choices: Try to irritate her stomach--maybe she'll throw up.
Wait for a minute, and try to come up with a better plan.
11221121121121111211.content:
Great giant teeth slam all around you, but somehow, you manage not to be destroyed by them. Instead, you become engulfed in a wad of masticated goo as the girl swallows, and you dive down into her gullet.

You're less panicked than you might have been before. You survived inside the swallow, and you hope you'll survive inside the girl, too. But you know, sadly, that there are only two ways out of here, neither very pleasant.

The girl finishes her meal, and heads into class, with you sloshing around in her stomach. You've got to get out of here. What do you do?
11221121121121111211.title: Swallowed

choices: Climb out the esophagus
Go the long way
112211211211211112112.content:
You decide that the girl can't help you, so you'll just have to help yourself.

You presume that she finally sat down, since the sloshing has stopped. You consider the two ways out:
112211211211211112112.title: Swimming

choices: Piss
Crap
1122112112112111121122.content: You climb over to the end of the stomach and climb into what appears to be the way to the large intestines.
