Your hopes are confirmed, as the small ring quickly sucks you in completly, into a dark, slick tube. You feel yourself being slowly pushed through the intestine, and after about an hour of so, you fall asleep out of exaushtan. When you wake up, you discover that your head is reasting on a small ring, much like the intestinal track, you realize that she is about to eject you as...
1122112112112111121122.title: The long way out

11221121121121111212.content:
Relentlessly, the teeth and the tongue work together to tear the tiny island you have been standing on apart. Finally, you have no choice to jump into the gooey mass below.

         The landing is harder than expected as the munched food still consists of large fragments, at least from your point of view. Everything is covered with a slimy mixture of saliva and squashed food. It takes you ages to get back upright, and by the time you are standing, your entire body is wet and filthy.

         Looking around, you notice that you are much to close to her teeth for comfort. Hastily, you try to move away, but the mass covering the ground is sticky, stickier than you expected. You lose your balance and fall down onto the floor again.

         With a swift movement, the tongue throws this blob of food with you inside in between the teeth. Rolling onto your back, you can see the gigantic rock of her molar become larger and larger as it descends. Then a moment of pain, followed by the void.
11221121121121111212.title: Chomped

choices: Talk
play dumb
1122112112112111122.content:
The bite that you are expecting doesn't come. Instead, you are suddenly plucked from the bread between two powerful fingers, and raised to the huge green eyes of the girl. Each blink that she takes while she inspects you buffets you with gale force winds.

'What are you?' she breathes. presumably it sounds quiet to her, but to you it is almost deafening.

Well, what should you do? You could try to communicate with her, but who's to say what she would do? You may end up as her pet, rather than getting help in returning to normal.

You could play dumb, in the hopes that she will leave you and you can find someone else to aid you, but there's a chance that she'll just squish you if she thinks that you're of no use.
1122112112112111122.title: Erm...  Hello?

choices: You come to in Show and Tell
You come to back at the girl's house
11221121121121111221.content:
So, held between finger and thumb by an eleven year old girl sitting on the steps tp her school. It's just a mild onconvenience. Even though you're but half an inch tall, you should easily be able to outsmart her with your learned college brain.

You clear your throat, preparing your speech.

Just as you open your mouth to confound the youngster with your words, she drops you. You freefall briefly, before landing in the warm palm of her other hand. Plans go out the window. You just shout.

"Listen, girl! You'd better start treating me with some respect! I -"

You pause as you realise just who you've been shouting at. You lower your wagging finger to your side and gaze up at the somewhat annoyed face of the giantess.

"WHAT did you say? Hey, you can talk! Wow!"

A confused babble rushes over you as the girl forgets what it was that you said, caught up in the fact that you DID speak - making you quite the find, apparantly.

You try to explain yourself through her gabbling, but her voice is just so loud that your chances are pretty low. When she's finished, she merely clasps you in her fist, surrounding you in warm flesh. You know no more for the time being.
11221121121121111221.title: Gabble

choices: Have a well earned rest
Look for help
1122112112112112.content:
Edging around the girl's sneakers, you hurry off towards the slopes that lead up to what you hope is salvation. She doesn't pluck you from the ground at all, so you can assume that you've gone unnoticed.

The trek up the ramp is not so bad; it's not at all steep, and the surface of it is quite rugged at your size, not slippery at all.

You keep your eyes on the girl; you move up past head height, but her eyes are busy watching her more energetic friends. You follow her gaze, noting thankfully that there don't appear to be any wheelchair bound students. presumably the school only has the ramp in order to meet regulations. You should be safe here.

Well, safe but hungry.

Checking again that the girl is oblivious to you, you march onwards and upwards, admiring the view. Eventually the girl once more gets to her feet, her shadow falling over you again. For a moment you fear for your life; but then she runs back to rejoin her colleagues.

Finally at the top, you pause to catch your breath. And note, with a sinking heart, that the doors are closed. Fuck.

I guess that you could wait here for them to open (it can't be long until the bell goes, surely, but would you survive the rush inside?), but from your vantage point you could just hunt out a kid who either looks likely to help or has some food.
1122112112112112.title: Conquering Everest Can't Be As Hard As This

choices: Go for her hand
Let her make the first move
11221121121121122.content:
There. A girl, probably eight years old or so, all alone. Many might have questioned your wisdom as choosing someone so young as someone to look to for help in your current condition, but it's pretty simple.

All the other kids are running around like mindless idiots, and to approach them would be death, whether you were noticed or not. This girl, on the other hand, appears to be playing around in the grass, and you would be noticed by her straight away.

Going back down the ramp is easier than going up. And skirting the edge of the area where the kids play is easier than marching straight through the middle. Your heart still skips a beat at each footstep of the towering titans running around scarily close, but in the cover of the longer grass you feel almost safe.

Now you close on your target. Despite her young age, she is still a looming mountain of flesh to you. She wears a red dress, and sits cross legged on the floor, delighting as a spider crawls along the back of her hand.

The spider is easily twice the size of a lion.

Still, you can't go getting cold feet now. You've got to go through with this. She lowers her enormous paw to the ground to let the arachnid scuttle off. This is your chance.

But should you un straight for her hand -possibly startling her- or merely walk around a bit to -hopefully- get her attention and be picked up by her?
11221121121121122.title: An Interest In Nature

choices: Leap from the brownie while she's holding it in midair
Wait, and hope the girl sets it down.
112211211211211221.content:
You decide that the best course of action is to go for the girl's hand--she's sure to notice you, and you just can't stand the thought of not being noticed.

So you charge for the hand, and leap for it, clinging desperately to her pinky finger as the hand is suddenly lifted up.

Thank God! She's going to notice you!

No, she isn't.

Instead, the girl reaches into her backpack to grab a book, and you're knocked loose. You fall into a pile of papers and pencils and crayons and textbooks...and an enormous brown bag that can only be lunch.

You notice a tiny hole in the bag, more than big enough for you to sneak through. You pull yourself inside, and see a giant apple, and enormous juice box, a tremendous brownie, and a peanut butter sandwich in a plastic wrapper.

You head for the brownie, and you're eating happily when the bell rings and the girl goes into the school.

* * *

You doze off after a while, laying on top of the brownie.

It's been a hard day, and you're full and happy and relaxed, and for the moment, you're safe in a lunchbag on a shelf. You crash hard. So hard that you don't even feel it when the bag is suddenly lifted up, and the girl heads off for the lunchroom. Don't feel it when the bag is offloaded. You finally stir just as the girl finishes her sandwich, and you cry out as you see the girl lift the brownie and start to eat it.
112211211211211221.title: Full

choices: Finger
Face
1122112112112112212.content:
No, the girl proceeds straight to eating. Having already been through a sparrow, you don't really want to be eaten again. But the yawning cave of her mouth stretches wider and wider as you are dragged closer, and the stench from the sandwich that she has just devoured wafts over you. You almost gag.

You are too high up to jump now, but you could go for the girl's finger again. It is pressing down on one edge of the brownie, so you could grab hold of that to not only get her attention, but to not get eaten.

Alternatively, you could wait until the last moment and then jump for her face...
1122112112112112212.title: Feed Me

choices: she notices you
she licks her fingers
11221121121121122121.content:
You figure the easiest way off the giant brownie is to go for the finger.

You run as fast as you can to keep from being part of her lunch. As you get to her finger, she begins eating the brownie.

You climb down her finger a bit, just to be safe, but...
11221121121121122121.title: Mmm, food

choices: Go the naturural way.
Go back the way you came.
112211211211211221212.content:
She brings her fingers to her mouth and starts licking and sucking on them, making you lose your grip.

You fall on her tongue, which is moving non-stop.

Then there is a rush of saliva that pulls you to the back of her mouth.

You turn around and wish you hadn't.

In front of you, you see the young girl's throat.

Then with a loud and wet *GULP*, you go down her throat, and within a few seconds, you arrive at the girl's stomach.

What now...
112211211211211221212.title: she licks her fingers

choices: It's a girl
It's a boy
112211211211212.content:
For several mintes of running and dodging you make your way safely, although a marble does coe close to knocking you off your feet at one point.

Then a sneaker crashes down in front of you, and you run straight into it. It's like running into a wall, and you are dazed for several vital seconds. Long enough for the owner of the sneaker to spot you and pick you up...
112211211211212.title: Not so Sneaky...

choices: Laura comes over to look
Your captress is jostled by a boy, and falls over
1122112112112121.content:
You shake yourself out of your daze to gaze up at the phenomonal form of a little girl's face looking down at you. She blinks repeatedly, as if not believing what she sees before her. And who are you to blame her? It can't be that often that a half-inch tall man collides with your shoe.

Still, now that you've gotten someone's attention, it's time to take charge. No matter how massive the girl may be, she's still a child, and should recognise your authority as an adult. You pull yourself up straight and tall as you are able, and address her loudly and clearly.

She's not paying attention. "Hey, Laura! Come and look at this!" she booms, and you cower at the monstrous sound of her voice.
1122112112112121.title: Cut Down to Size

choices: He wants to put you under a magnifying glass
He wants to make you fight a bug
1122112112112122.content:
You come to in a warm place. The palm of someone's hand, fingers several times thicker and taller than your whole body rise up around you. Above them, peering down, a face that is the sky. The boy is maybe ten years old, and his large brown eyes look at you with wonder, his moth grinning.

'Cool...' he booms, and you know that you're in trouble...
1122112112112122.title: Boys and their Toys

choices: You must fight
The arena is disturbed
11221121121121222.content:
Time passes, and you swim back into consciousness again. Getting to your feet, you find yourself lying down once more on concrete. Around you, vast impenetrable walls, made up of a circle of young boys, legs crossed beneath them.

Each stares intently down at you, and you spin around, seeing that you are surrounded. Then a shadow falls over you, and you turn to see a hand withdrawing back to its owner's lap, having deposited what it was carrying.

The glossy back scorpion swings around to look at you, claws swishing through the air. You look upwards to notice its stinger, alone the size of you. One hit, and you'd be done for.

The boys begin to shout, cheering on either you or this monster in a fight to the death...
11221121121121222.title: Fifty Quatloons on the Newcomer!

choices: Shout to the woman now to get her attention
Wait until she's gone, THEN escape
112211211211212222.content:
Suddenly the din ceases, and something else enters the arena, the boys swaying aside to allow it entry. The sandalled foot crashes down between you and the scorpion, throwing you to the ground.

In appearance, it is similar to the one that you rode in on, only its owner is paler and, you think, just a bit smaller in scale. She is wearing a long blue dress, with what looks like a flower pattern upon it.

Once more you are grasped in fingers, only these are much bigger than the boy's. She seems to be applying less pressure though, and you are at least able to breathe. From your vantage point, held between the forefinger and thumb of her left hand, you peer past the whorled surfaces to see the scorpion held by the tail in the other. Around, boys are getting to their feet, and you discover that you are being held above their heads. Probably not a good idea to look down...

So, instead, you move as much as you can to allow yourself to see the face of your saviour. Her young, open face is surrounded by a mass of strawberry blonde, curly hair. Perhaps she's a teacher here, you guess. You are proven correct when she speaks.

'Now, boys, how many times have I told you? If you want to see Boris eat, you can wait until his feeding time, like everybody else! You certainly don't take him out of his cage! What would have happened if he' stung one of you, eh?'

The boys don't seem to have any answer to this, although a few mumble sorrys.

'Well, run along now and play and we'll say no more about it.'

Then you are in motion, carried along at neck height by the woman. You see crowds of kids pass by beneath you, some looking at you or Boris, others concentrating on their youthful games. The entrance to the school loom before you, and she effortlessly ascends what would have been an impenetrable cliff of doom to you.

Soon you are in a classroom, the alphabet running along the top of the wall above the blackboard. You see the right hand lowering Boris into a large glass tank filled with broken vegetation, with a scattering of sand at the bottom. Then you are live with fear; what if she intends to feed you to this creature? You escaped from a sparrow's belly, yes, but a scorpion is bound to chew its prey into smaller pieces...

You are relieved when you see her move away from Boris' lair. She briefly raises you to her face and says:

'Now let's get you back you belong.'

For a moment you are ecstatic; she's seen you, and she wants to help! But as you see what she holds in her right hand now, you realise that she is performing that trick so beloved of women everywhere; talking to a pet.

She drops you, and you fall into the high sided plastic cup that she holds, along with the swarms of miscellaneous creepy crawlies already there. You plunge into the mass head first, and are soon fending off antennae from a dozen admirers. Clearly, this is Boris' food supply - he likes it live. You came here looking for food, and it seems that you're now set to become it.

In a brief moment of freedom, you look up to see the woman's face covering the entrance, smiling down at you all.

'Time to put you somewhere where little hands can't get to you.' she says.

Oh no! She's going to put the cup high up on a shelf somewhere! If she does that, you've got no chance of getting down! You're going to have to act now!

Or are you panicking about nothing?
112211211211212222.title: Out of the Frying Pan?

choices: picks you to feed to Boris.
picks another unlucky creature.
1122112112112122221.content:
You shout. You scream. You yell with all your might. But you should know by now that your vocal cords are just too small to make any kind of meaningful sound. The woman simply ignores you as she puts the jar of bugs back in its spot.

You do your best to climb the walls of the jar--if for no other reason than to get away from the sundry ants and whatnot. You reach the top cover--a mesh cover that is designed to keep tiny things in. Tiny things like you.

The hours pass, and inevitably, the woman returns. You try to make yourself invisible, as she didn't recognize you as human earlier. She....
1122112112112122221.title: Good luck with all that.

choices: Climb onto her actual foot
Roll to the floor
11221121121122.content: You lose track of time, your stomach combining with the terrible motion of the woman's walking to render you paralysed with sickness and pain. How much longer can this comtinue? you briefly wonder to yourself. Of course, just as all good things come to an end, so too do most bad things. And so you find the giantess stopping, standing in a hallway of what you presume to be her home. It looks as though she's about to kick her footwear off, so you'd better act fast.
11221121121122.title: Enjoy the Ride

choices: She sees you for what you are
She thinks you're something else
112211211211221.content:
The feet come thundering to the ground either side of you, but you are undaunted, clambering aboard without hesitation. You've been having a very bad day, and you're not going to take any shit anymore.

Of course, the woman can feel you walking on her like you were an insect; now you'll finally find out who she is as she peers down at your tiny form in puzzlement.
112211211211221.title: Footloose and Fancy Free

choices: The woman plans to catch you in a jar
The woman has a piece of paper for you to climb onto
1122112112112211.content:
You sit on the massive toe of the woman, gazing up at her distant, yet beautiful, middle-aged face, a considerable distance away from you in the sky above.

"Oh gosh," she says, before staring silently at you for a while. In your impatience you attempt shouting up at her, but even with your hands cupped around your mouth you know that it's futile. "I can't hear you," she confirms, "and I don't dare to bend down to pick you up without doing myself a mischief. Get onto the floor and I'll be back in a minute to get you."

As you hop down, you smile triumphantly. Your plan has succeeded! Then there's a lurch of fear as the woman takes a step over you. She's far enough from you not to be in danger of stepping on you, but you're still in awe as her entire, vast form passes overhead like the statue of Liberty come to life. The tremors that accompany her feet smashing down again remind you of the mass that she's carrying, and rather than happening in slow motion they are a constant thunder as she paces thousands of feet away from you in seconds, swinging out of view through one of the mighty portals lining the hallway. But even when she's visibly removed, noise and vibration carry back to your position, and you wonder in trepidation what she has planned.
1122112112112211.title: Aid At Last

choices: Not realizing, she tilts the paper and you head for her wedding ring!
Her grip slips on the paper and you land in her purse hanging on a chair!
11221121121122112.content:
Looks like the woman is returning and she has something for you to sit on and keep you safe...a sheet from a notepad.

“I’m going to lower the paper onto the floor. Make sure you sit in the middle,” the woman says as she approaches your position.

She bends down and gently places the notepad paper near you. It’s a vast appearance, but eventually you reach the middle of the notepad paper.

Now comes the travel...the woman’s hands slowly start to lift the paper; looks like things are going well.

Suddenly, something happens!
11221121121122112.title: Have Paper, Will Travel

choices: Run between her legs
Run away from her
1122112112112212.content:
An incredible distance above you, you can see the face of the woman, looking down at you. You estimate her age to be somewhere in the early- to mid-forties, not that she seems to have lost her beauty with age. Of course, from your unique perspective you could never be considered the most reliable of judges.

Then the world shakes around you at an incredible speed, even faster and more gut-wrenching than the journey you had getting here on the woman's foot. You cannot cling to the toe through such as this, and fly from it to thump against the floor.

That floor then vibrates beneath you as the titanic foot of the giantess is returned to the ground, the insect upon it having been shaken free. Getting to your feet, you back away slowly, even as the corner of your eye registers her hand closing around the handle of a broom leaning against the back of the door. Her toes rear up once - possibly in disgust - and then she raises one foot in a prelude to advancing upon you, broom-shaped death for you in mind.

How to get out of this one?
1122112112112212.title: Broom Upraised

choices: get swept up and thrown in the trash
hold on to the broom strawls and avoid the dustpan
11221121121122122.content:
she looks down and says to herself, "dirty floor''
she walks towards the closet, her footsteps are loud as earthquakes, she walks back with a broom and begins the sweep up the floor you run for your life but you.....
11221121121122122.title: Run away from her

choices: Follow the woman
Go exploring
112211211211222.content:
The feet come thundering down either side of you, causing you to fall over. Then the woman begins to walk, steps of two hundred and thirty feet at a time taking her rapidly away from you. Your hunger forces you to stand - you need food.

There's none here, though. Judging by where the woman left her sandals, and the appearance of the closed door to your right, this would be an entrance hallway. You think you can make out a line of coathooks towards the unimaginably distant ceiling. There's only one exit, as you can't open the door, and that is down the hallway, in the direction that the woman's echoing footsteps are coming from. Maybe she's gone to get herself a snack in the kitchen. You could follow her, hoping to find a little something for yourself. Alternatively, you could try exploring the rest of the house, try to find some scraps of food on the floor. And hope that this woman doesn't own a cat...
112211211211222.title: So What Now?

choices: Got that right!  She;s feeding her cat...
She's making a sandwich
1122112112112221.content:
You take in the wonder sof the collossal home as you walk. The dors are beyond imagining, the windows higher than the sun itself; surely this is a place of the gods.

Cabinets form whole new walls, although you find it possiblt to walk under them, getting some shade from the galrinf heat of the orb that may well be a lightbulb.

Your journey takes quite a while, but eventually you find the woman. Judging by the white theme of the mountainous furniture, you guess that this is the kitchen. Looks like she's preparing food!
1122112112112221.title: Home of the Gods

choices: Try to gain entry to the shower
Find somewhere to hide before the cat comes looking
11221121121122211.content:
You recoil in horror at the sight of the monstrous being that the goddess is feeding. She dwarfs it as she bends over it, but then that's her right as a person the size of a skyscraper to you. The beast itself could happily bat a full-grown elephant around in its paws like a toy; you'd be less than a bite-size morsel for it.

Its black and white striped tail lashes in the air in anticpation as it watches the woman shovel vast quantities of food into its stadium of a bowl. It moves in swiftly once she has finished, the wrenching sound of it devouring meat terrifying.

She pauses once to run her hand along its back before standing up to her full, impressive height. Her bare foot lifts, and you hurl yourself flat against the wall as she crosses past you in two awesome strides, back into the hallway.

You run after her, but your tiny paces are no match for her speed. You cannot see where she went, but can already hear the cacophony of a deluge taking place beyond one of the immense portals. She must be having a shower or something...

Aw crap. Once the cat finishes its meal, it'll be on the prowl, and sure to find you. The woman was your only hope, but she's hopelessly beyond your reach now.

Unless... Possibly you could get to the shower, enter it and avoid death from the rain for long enough to get aid from the woman. It's a long shot, all right, but it's the only alternative to hiding from that darn cat! But then, you're a human being; you should be able to outsmart a feline, no matter how gargantuan it is. Right?
11221121121122211.title: Cat Food

112211211211222112.content:
You're confident that you can outsmart the cat, and hide behind a table leg. You wait nervously for the cat to finish its meal. It doesn't take the cat long to finish its meal, and after a few moments it starts to go on the prowl. As you hide behind the table leg, you listen to the sound of the cats footsteps. When you no longer hear them you catiously come out from your hiding place to make sure the cat is gone and nearly jump out of your skin. Standing right in front of you is the cat, and it has its eyes fixed on you. For some time you stare at the cat too terrified to move, and the cat stares back with its tail flicking back and forth. Then the cat licks its lips and pins you down with its paw. You snap out of your fear induced paralysis and start squirming in attempt to get out from under the paw, but it's already too late as the cat lowers its open maw to you. You scream in terror as the cat quickly scoops you up into its mouth.

You find yourself lying on the cat's giant tongue, completely in the dark. Saliva begins to cover you as you're blasted by the cat's fowl smelling breath. Then the cat starts to lick you against the roof of its mouth and roll you around on its tongue. The tongue feels painful as the cat tastes you, and soon you begin to hear it purring. It clearly likes how you taste, but you just want it to stop. The cat savors your delicious flavor for a few more moments and then its tongue starts to settle down. Unfortunately, that's when it starts to push towards the back of the throat, and you scream in terror again. Then the cat tilts its head back and with a loud gulp swallows you whole. You slowly travel down the esophagus to your final destination. It feels like you're going down a slimey waterslide though, as you become drenched in more saliva. Eventually your journey comes to an end as you land in the stomach with a plop.

You sit in the stomach too terrified to even try and save your life. Soon the digestive jucies begin to flow and start going to work on you. Fortunately you pass out from a lack of air as you start to be digested; thus saveing you from much excrutiateing pain. Meanwhile, the cat lays down to take a nap while digests the tastiest dessert it has ever had.
112211211211222112.title: Cat Dessert

112211211212.content:
The climb is nothing, you'll just have to find yourself somewhere to stand. The toes flex again, and you decide not to stand near them. Despite being smaller than you, each contains enough mass and muscular force to break every bone in your body. As soon as they stop, you jump on top of them, and decide that lying face down would be the best way to travel. You could hang on to the strap of the sandal that bisects this smoothly skinned foot.

Your plan worked in theory, but you hadn't been expecting the girl to skip across the road. When she does so, you are dislodged at once, and sent flying into a lethal impact with something that you never see.
112211211212.title: One Small Step

choices: Attack the monsters before they do the same to you
Calmly walk on
112211212.content:
You wish that you had a machete, because pushing your way through these huge plants really is tiring. The hot summer sun isn't helping either.

Then there is a whisper of noise, and you find yourself surrounded by creatures that aren't concerned by such things.

Each perches atop a blade of grass, clinging on with six taloned limbs. Their bulbous heads have their strange eyes fixed upon you, but not one of them moves. You're no expert on insects, so you can't identify them (even when each is twice the bulk of you), but you have a feeling that they're not here to help you find the Ring.
112211212.title: Surrounded

choices: You try to use the feathers to fly down
You start climbing down the tree
11221122.content:
All of this has just exhausted you. Being shrunk to microscopic size, being attacked by a sparrow, and now eaten by its offspring. It's just too much. Why should you fight on? There is probably no way for you to return to normal, and even if there was, it is nearly impossible for you to figure it out. Before you could even get some investigation started, you would probably get crushed under someone's shoe or squashed by a book falling of a shelf. Why not end the hopeless game here and now.

         Giving in to despair, you lie back and wait for the gentle embrace of death. Time passes, but you are still alive. Come to think of it, shouldn't there be something like stinging pains as the acid dissolves your body. There certainly is the smell of acid in the air. Opening your eyes again, you can see the half- digested food surrounding you. Still, you yourself seem to be unharmed although most of your body is covered by the clear liquid. Somehow, you seem to be protected against the acids!

         If the acids won't do you in and with air not being a problem either, it would seem, there is no way you could die here. This revelation is like a message from heaven itself, telling you to fight on. You have been given an unexpected chance, so you have to make use of it. Kicking and boxing you assault the hot walls surrounding you. The slime covering them somewhat dampens your assault, but just as you start doubting the effectivenss of your ministrations, everything is thrown about as the walls around you suddenly jump. With tremendous force, you and the food stuff are pushed up through the esophagus you have passed not so long ago. Up ahead, you suddenly see a spot of light, and then you are outside. Free again!

         This freedom is not absolutely perfect, though. You are still inside the sparrow's nest. Mother sparrow is nowhere to be seen, but the young chicks are still there. And everything is set up high in a tree, really high from your point of view.

         Looking around the nest, you see some feathers lying around, some of them as big as you are. You wonder if you could make some wings or something out of them. Given your small size, maybe you could kind of glide down. But that's risky. The alternative would be to climb down the tree, a humbly prospect, indeed. But you definately don't want to spend the rest of your days among some stupid birds.
11221122.title: You are tougher than expected

choices: Fate smiles on you as you reach the edge without problem
Fate frowns on you, as you are swallowed whole by a fish
112212.content:
As you helplessly wait for fate's next twist, the bird's crop starts contracting, pushing its contents including you out of it. After falling down a fleshy chute, you end up in a bigger chamber. There is sooth everywhere, and the floor is covered by a pool of liquid which gives of an acidic smell. The sparrow's stomach, no doubt.
         Desperately, you try to keep out of the acid, but no matter how hard you try, a part of you is always submerged, be it a foot, a hand, or anything. After struggling for nearly a minute, you pause. Having sputter lots of acid all over you, you should certainly be in pain by now, but nothing. You examine your left hand, which is currently in a pool of the liquid. Not reddened, no signs of dissolving. Somehow, you have become protected from the acid. And you don't feel like suffocating either. Things are really getting weirder and weirder. Still, you are the bird's prisoner, and although it can't harm you, it would seem, you can't get out of it either.
         The stomach starts to move, squishes its contents. At first it feels like a massage, not really that unpleasant. Then you see one of the stones the sparrow had swallowed before approach. THUD! The walls shove the rock into you. It feels like its being pushed right through your body, and this is definitely not pleasant. Then the pressure eases, and the stone drops away. You take advantage of this and move before there is the next contraction. But all around you, everything is moving, and there were several stones the sparrow had swallowed.
         Realizing that the stomach still is too dangerous a place, you look for the exit. It isn't hard to find the muscle ring that closes of the intestines from the stomach. Applying some strength, you are able to force it open. Wedging in your arms, you shove in your head and chest. Then you start wriggling, until your feet have also left the stomach.
         The intestines were definitely not designed to accomodate you. You are squeezed by the walls as they are slowly shoving you onwards. Actually, you can't move except for some weak wriggling. Your arms are trapped at your sides. It is hot, wet, and the smell ...
         This trip takes like eternity, but finally, you can see some light ahead. It grows bigger and bigger, and then you are surrounded by fresh air. You rejoice - for a moment before you realize that you are really surrounded by fresh air! The sparrow has relieved itself in midflight, sending you falling down towards a dark grey surface. You scream as you hit it. Although it turns out to be water, the impact is still cruel. Your head spins, and everything hurts. But you are alive. Struggling a bit, you are able to resurface and breathe again.
         As you recover from the fall, you see the university's main building in the distance above some weird jungle. Adjusting your interpretations you realize that this must be the university's pond. Well, although it was a rough ride, it did get you close to your target. You just have to swim to the edge, and then walk over the yard into the building.
         As you swim over the edge, you thank heavens for the pond being there. You have never really cared too much for it, but there are other students that help keep it clean, spend afternoons looking at the water, feeding the fish, or hang around it for some other reasons. Fish! You suddenly remember that there are fish in the pond. For a normal- sized person just some part of the background, but at your size, they should be as big as large sharks. You start swimming faster, giving it all you have. The rest is up to fate, though.
112212.title: Welcome on Flight Sparrow 001

choices: You attempt to run and the doggie eats ya
you stay still, he swallows ya with little effort
1122121.content:
With great effort you haul yourself up onto the shoreline. Lying back you relax your tired muscles and bask in the light of the sun. How long were you in that sparrow? At least a day, maybe an eternity for all you can tell. It was a rough trip, but you made it out alive! Suddenly you start to laugh out loud, realising for the first time all that you were just through. Hell how could you have survived something like that, being eaten and passing all the way through? "Heheh, guess this makes me bird shit" you mumble to yourself, and attracting the attention of a nearby creature.
Still chuckling to yourself everything around you is quickly forgotten. Suddenly it's as though nothing matters, the huge world is unimportant, your basking in the afterglow of survival. But what's that strange noise? You break your chain of laughter and return to the real world with the strange sound of panting coming from behind you. Before you have a chance to turn around a shadow falls over you. Looking up, you see a giant, canine face of brown and black. Amber eyes blink as they gaze down on you, and a wet, pink tongue throbs in and out of a mouth left agape. He looks like a great rottweiler, a champion dog if ever you saw one.
A pity champions need so much food, a bigger pity that this one seems hungry... the biggest pity is that your right in front of him. Maybe someone should tell the dog that you've already had your anatomy lesson for the day...
1122121.title: Relaxation, afterthoughts, and rottweilers

choices: You land in the yard you have been in before
You land on the owner's hand as she was checking what was bothering her '
11221211.content:
You have had enough maltreatment by lower life- forms for one day. Jumping to your feet, you start running, hoping to find a place to hide away from the mutt until it loses its interest in you.

         Your plan has just a few minor flaws, like your speed being much too slow to outrun that huge beast. It takes a step forward, bows down its head lower, and effortlessly picks you up with its tongue.

         You are surrounded by hot humidity and a rotten stench. You feel sick, but you know you have to concentrate on the task ahead. As the tongue enters the mouth, you jump off in between the tongue and the teeth. Under the tongue you start kicking and scratching. Immediately, you are covered in saliva.

         The tongue fights back, trying to get a hold of you again, but every time it dislodges you, you are able to roll off again. Your breath goes heavily and your arms and legs are getting heavy, but you need to fight on.

         At long last, the dog decides to give in and gets rid of you with a snort.
11221211.title: Oh no, you won't

choices: Your mother, home from buying groceries
Your little sister, home from school
112212111.content:
It's your mother's yard! The stupid dog just took a crap on your yard... With you in it! The dog's owner continues walking, and pretends not to see the pile of dog poo.

All of a sudden, you hear a stomping noise. You turn around and see...
112212111.title: Awwh, crap!

choices: You have been "dropped off" in a green patch
This doggie has a bad habit. You are inside a house
11221212.content:
You remember that you should play dead when facing such a beast. Quickly you drop to the ground, close your eyes. Your muscles are tense as you wait.

         Warm air, carrying a smell of rot and decay washes over you. Then you suddenly feel something hit you, lifting you of the ground. You open your eyes and scream as you see the ceiling of the dog's mouth rush up against you. The impact, followed by darkness.
...

         As you regain consciousness, you first notice the heat all around you. Then there is an undeterminable stench, quite unbearable. Your body feels heavy as you seem to be buried in mud. Opening your eyes, you see an oddly structured ceiling above you in the shadows. It is rather dark. Looking around you, you find that you are buried neck deep in some undeterminable, wet mass. You are in some kind of round tunnel. Moving closer to the walls, you realize that the structures are actually thousands of soft, bending sticks covering the entire wall.

         There is no doubt that you are somewhere inside that stupid dog. But you have no real idea where exactly. And even less of an idea of how to get out. Well, there is one way you can think of. Thus, you decide to wait it out.

         For ages, the mass is being shoved through endless tunnels, the walls becoming smooth and your surroundings becoming drier. Finally, you fall out into the light. But where are you?
11221212.title: Oh brother

choices: Too tired....give in.....
No!   Musn't.....go like....this.....
1122122.content:
The fish wiggles its tailfin in the water, speeding toward you with an unstoppable force. A good five times your size, the plump aquatic beast opens its scaley maw, clamping down mid-calf on your legs. You thrash and writhe, but it simply jerks forward with another snapping of its jaws, sucking you up to your chest in its gullet. The fish, seemingly quite pleased with such a large catch, then gulps again, sending your delightfully meaty body down the massaging gullet, into the tight belly within.

Pressed amongst a mush of worms and other water goodies, your body is numbed slightly, the walls of the stomach churning all around you. You can sense the complacancy of the fish... you can -feel- its content with having eaten you. Just like that, and you're far better then any worm it's had...
1122122.title: Fishfood

choices: Stay put for now
Go with the flow
11221221.content:
Things are looking very grim for you now, hoplessly trapped in the belly of a fish. A putrid mix surrondeds you, and pushes against your body from all angles. Your body is held tight, and you can barely move. Slowly unconciousness starts to set in, your mind shuts down

------------------------------

A few hours later you awaken in a very hot, tight place. The smell here is nasty, and your body is covered in a thick sludge. This obviously isn't your normal bed, and though still in a haze your mind works out where you are, deep inside the fish. What you don't know however is that the fish has been dead for nearly an hour, having been caught and eaten by a raccoon. The Raccoon suffered a similar fate still, having met up with a hungry puma... In fact you inside a bit of the fish that wound up inside a bit of the raccoon that was devoured by the puma. It's a vicious food chain, and sadly your stuck at the bottom of it, and at the bottom of a mountain lion's stomach.

Slowly the digestive juices eat away at the fish and raccoon, leaving you untouched and alone inside the large cat. Whatever shrunk you seems to have left you with some sort of immunity, maybe to balance out the problems with being so small. It looks like you'll be needing it too, Who know's what hungry creatures you'll find once you get back outside. Speaking of which, the content's of the puma's stomach is starting to empty out into it's intestines, will you follow suit?
11221221.title: It's a Vicious Food Chain

choices: Follow the sound of the water.
Go towards the wall.
112212212.content:
You squeeze yourself into the small hole where the rest of the digested mass is passing through and let the body do all the work. Your body passes through a fleshy tube for what seems like and eternity until your finally and violently pushed out of the feline's body into a patch of sand along with the rest of the mass that wasn't digested. After having finished it's business, the puma covers you up with sand and heads away.

After a little bit of digging you manage to get yourself up and out of the sand, your view of the area is limited for the moment with it being nighttime. Thankfully the moon is shining overhead giving you enough light to make out that you're on some sort of mountain-ish area. The are few large trees and many bushes around you. The sound of water is heard behind you and there seems to be a wall of sorts in the distance in front of you.
112212212.title: Alone in the wilderness.

choices: Going up
Stay put
11222.content:
Not wanting to dare fate, you work your way slowly backwards into the root system of the gigantic tree. Wedged deep in a grotto, you find safety from the birds. The moments stretch into what seems like hours, as the pecking and scratching draws nearer. You feel as if the mammoth sparrow is right on top of you, mere inches away. You imagine it’s sharp pointed beak stabbing at pecking at your flesh.

It’s all you can do not to bolt and run.

Seconds latter, it’s all over. The flapping of wings indicates your safety as the bird takes flight. You make your way out of the musty hole in the ground.

That was close. Too close.

Walking out into the bright morning sun, you look around. The tree is smack in the middle of a little patch of dirt, just a bit away from the entrance to the bar. The street lies just beyond, to your left. It’s not that busy - well, compared to a downtown street. The run down cantina finds itself just on the border of town, the last bastion of civilization before the three or so miles of wilderness to the collage. This is the main drag into to the academy, so there is a fair amount of traffic - both foot and vehicle. Getting back to safety should be no problem.

After walking for an hour - and making no appreciable progress in the meantime, you eventually reach the bus stop. [i]This is going to take me days - all week![/i] That’s when you spot her.

She’s a young girl - freshman, you’d guess. Long brown hair, deeply tanned skin. Cut off shorts, leather biker jacket, black sandals, topped off by round framed sunglasses. Her attention is currently held by a thick tome with a black cover of some sort. She seems largely oblivious to the world.

*sigh* I know where this is going. you think loudly to yourself, walking slowly forward.

This sandal is huge!! The sole part is two inches thick - well above your head. On the up side, it's also covered in carved designs, making it a snap to climb. Tentatively, you start making your way up the side of her shoe. Fortunately the girl doesn’t seem to be moving a lot. It must be an engrossing book.

Reaching the top, you roll over onto the flat surface of the sandal. The ledge you are standing on is about 6 feet wide. Just to your immediate right is the where the strap meets the stitching of the sole. Above you is where the strap meets the ankle. Before you is a vast wall of flesh, covered in tiny (and gigantic) lines. You reach out and touch her tough, leathery skin. Its firm under your hand.

I wonder if she is ticklish. you ponder with an evil grin, poking her foot gently. No response, of course.

You look up - this is going to be a long climb, if you choose to make it. If the bus comes along and she starts moving, you could easily be dislodged. A fall from that height would surely be lethal. Of course, hanging out at foot level all day would get you nowhere fast. It might be fun, but certainly not productive.

What will it be, trooper?
11222.title: Catching a bus!

choices: You hitch a ride with Steve
You check out the other two stalls
113.content:
You consider your options and figure that you need some real help. Someone who will be able to help you analyze the incident and then act accordingly. And as far as you know, this means, you need one of the guys to help you, women just don't make enough sense. Given your small size, you need a place of silence, of tranquility and meditation. A place where men go to be undisturbed by reality. In other words, the toilet.
         Fortunately, the rest rooms are not far from the bar (it figures, considering the quality of the beverages). It doesn't take you long to reach them, and there are actually no tight spots for you. Inside, you find the usual implements: some sinks, toilet stalls, and all the other crap. Currently, there is little business going on, so you check out the stalls.
         The first stall is empty. The paper is gone and the strong smell from the bowl ensures that there won't be any clients using it again for some time. Without wasting time reading the obscene inscriptions former occupants have left, you walk through under the stall's side wall into the next one.
         The second stall is occupied. It's none of your acquaintances, which is actually a reason to rejoice as this guy definitely had one drink too many (actually must have been a couple of them). He is lying on the toilet, his head hanging down its side. Vomit is everywhere and the stench is terrible. The occupant is completely obliviously to this of course, as he is fast asleep.
         Before you reach the other side of the stall, you hear the toilet door open and someone turns on the faucet. As this sounds like a good chance to get noticed or at least take some action, you leave the stall for the main room of the toilet instead.
         It's Steve Michaelson, not exactly your best friend, but kind of okay. He has blonde hair and usually a tiny bit shorter than you are. He always wears black leather garments and dark sunglasses and tries to look cool. You don't know how, but he always shows up with a girl friend, although it is seldom the same one twice.
         It looks as if his latest date had rejected one of his famous offers in a direct way. The left side of his face is reddened and his glasses seem a bit tacky.          While getting onto his boots is rather tough going, climbing up his trousers is no problem as they are made of leather held together with gigantic stitches. You are just the right size to climb the without being seen by anyone. Not that Steve would be paying any attention to anything but his own reflection as he is repairing his battered image. But you are still too slow. Before you can reach the pocket or some other improved hiding place, Steve starts moving, effectively trapping you at your current location. Climbing up or down seems too risky, but as long as you stay where you are, you should have no problem holding on to him.
         You can't really figure out what tune he is humming as Steve enters the disco's main area. He stops, obviously checking out the situation. While you are still considering whether you should try to continue climbing up, he starts moving again. Thanks to your higher vantage point, you are able to understand that he is heading for the bar. The noise around you is deafening and being safe doesn't mean being comfortable, as Steve's would- be cool gait just makes you feel sick. Fortunately, the distance he has to walk isn't that long in spite of the fact that he has chosen the bar's opposite end.
         As he sits down saying "Feelin' lonely littl' lady?", you are able to see a white skirt on the next seat. Seems to be your lucky day as his prey is to the right side, the one on which you are as well. Moving your eyes upwards, you get to a pink blouse with not too big a bulge in it. Black hair, and that face - not cute, but beautiful none the less. You recognize her as Sandra Miller. She is known to be a bit shy and evasive. You haven't tried to score with her - yet. Seems as if Steve is about to beat you there.
         Back to your present situation, you consider your options. While it looked like a good idea in the beginning, following Steve may not be the thing you want to do. For all you know, he could stay here until the next morning, or he may end up at some girl's place. Although the latter needn't be completely disappointing, it would still be of no use for your current problem in size. Maybe you should cancel operation Steve and look for someone else. On the other hand, you have already come that far, you may just as well go along for it. So what's next?

And Steve is your neighbor at least, which is a very valuable advantage, given your current speed while walking. If he takes his time getting home, fine, you will just hide in his pocket and wait for him to arrive there, and eventually he will, as the supply of hair gel he can carry around with him is clearly limited. Therefore, Steve it is.

Using a deadly combination of small talks, jokes (some of them involuntary results of his "cool" image, no doubt), and some drinks, he has begun to erode Sandra's defenses. Giving them a closer examination confirms that you would have been better off in complete darkness: at least 2 used condoms, another one that hasn't been used, the sad remains of at least one cigarette pulverized in this pocket, and some big pipe that looks suspiciously like lip stick (would figure, though). Judging from her happy, if not blissful face, you figure that he/the drinks has/have been able to convince her for this night out with Steve.
