1212121112221112111212111112111121.content:
"That's them?" The young native warrior asked quietly from the ring of bushes near the pair's campsite. The flickering fire beside them slowly dying in the night.

"Yes."

The junior warrior whistled at the sight of the massive woman, as she stretched out an arm and rolled onto her back. "She's big."

"Yes - 54 feet of her. 8 Tons, I'd estimate."

Both of them settled back into the bushes to discuss strategy. "So we grab the little guy and hold him hostage until the big one returns our missing warriors?"

"Yeah - that's the idea." nodded the older warrior woman. "Princess K'lana wants her people back - and they vanished just after these two arrived. The logical conclusion? The mountain of a woman did something to them."

"How'd she get to be so big?"

"I have no idea - but that's why we're only capturing the little one." She nodded to her partner. "Come on."

The pair crept forward, towards Megan's feet. The gigantic woman was sound asleep, flat on her back. The normally quiet snoring emanating from her reverberated throughout the jungle.

The first warrior crouched near the gigantic heel of the large woman and peered around the corner. There, spread out in a nest of Megan's hair was their target. The normal sized man slept soundly, not but five feet away from the face of his woman. Both warriors looked at each other. This was going to take some doing.

The older one started forward - only to be interrupted by Megan snorting and coughing. She ducked back behind the woman's foot. The younger warrior glanced at her master and shrugged. The older one reached up, touching the sole of Megan's foot. She scratched lightly against her skin - no reaction from the giant. Satisfied that she was still asleep, she motioned her partner to follow.

They slowly quietly walked forward, drawing parallel to the sleeping man. The young native opened a hip pouch, withdrew a small thorn and jabbed it into John's neck. Within seconds, he was in a deep, deep sleep that only time could rouse him from. He was down for the count at least until they got back to the village.

The old one nodded, and reached under his shoulders. Without a sound, the pair slipped off into the jungle, leaving the sleeping giantess unaware that anything was wrong.
1212121112221112111212111112111121.title: Strangers in the night

choices: Meanwhile, Megan. . . .
Meanwhile, Brittany. . . .
12121211122211121112121111121111211.content:
John awoke with a groan. The hangover fuzz was still heavy in his brain as he struggled to identify where he was. Previous late night drinking binges had left him in some strange places - but this one took the cake. Bamboo bars at the cave entrance - cave? Native wall hangings, flickering torch light - two burley amazon-like women carrying spears on guard. The smell of smoke hung heavy in the air.

He rose to his feet slowly, shakily. She saw the mid-20's woman beyond the bars. She wore an elaborate, if minimal dress. She carried herself with an air of importance and power. Her hair was long and black, tied behind her back. She wore all manner of adornment befitting her station in life.

"This may seem like a stupid question - but where am I?" John finally asked.

"You are in the Shine of Alkazar, outlander. I am High Princess K'lana, and you are our prisoner."

"Alkazar? The ring guy?"

"I believe the appropriate gender would be Ring Gal." She moved closer to the cell. "What are you doing here, outlander?"

"We're here following a tresure map."

"This is how you know the name of Alkazar?"

"Sort of. I had a run-in with her handy work."

"This is why you are here? To seek the Rings of Destiny?"

"More to keep them out of the hands of bad guys - but yeah, you could say that."

"Then you must know that your journey is filled with danger and peril."

"No kidding? I hadn't noticed." John sat down on the bed again. "Since you seem to know so much - what's the skinny on the rings?" She looked at him blankly. "What's the story behind them. What do the other rings do?"

"I suppose it would do you no harm to know. The knowledge will never be useful - you'll never get the rest of them." She closed her eyes, as if summoning great knowledge from deep within her. "The ring of Shadow, the Ring of Mind, and Strength of the Gods - that is the other three rings."

"What the hell does that mean?"

She nodded knowingly. "That is for you to figure out, outlander."

A long silence hung between them. John finally broke the tension. "So now what?"

"Well, we predict that your woman will become enraged when she finds you missing. We'll be in contact with her then."

"What about the ritual sex and sacrifice."

"Only if you still want to. We only want our people back."

"That's all?"

"It depends on how cooperative your giant girlfriend is willing to be - but yes. Most likely." She motioned the guards to bring food. "But in the meantime, please enjoy our hospitality."
12121211122211121112121111121111211.title: Meeting Princess K'lana

choices: Megan stays in Hawaii; K'lashan goes to Spain with John
Megan and John set off for Spain
121212111222111211121211111211112111.content:
Megan knew nothing but rage upon finding John taken from her - stomping angrily after the footprints that led away from her makeshift bed, she surprised the Alkazarean camp just after their breakfast. Most of the warriors wailed at the sight of her and fled, but a brave few attacked her with their spears.

This only served to make her angrier. Growing even larger, the pinprick spears became as nothing to her, and she brought her feet down mightily, scattering huts and warriors alike.

Then, a different insect appeared. He seemed familiar somehow, but she was finding it hard to remember. Maybe she should make him bigger too, so that she could understand what he was trying to tell her...

***

'Stop, Megan!' John told his wife, grabbing her by the shoulders to prevent her from visiting any more devastation on the village. 'It's all right! These people are our friends! Now, if you'll just make us both normal size again...'

The way that he spoke, as if he knew her... She should listen, she felt tired. The rings could wait...

***

'It is as I feared.' K'lashan told the couple later, when the missing warriors had been restored, and John separated Megan from the rings. 'The power of the rings is great, but with it they bring great misery' - she swept her arm to take in the rebuilding work that her people were already beginning - 'and madness.'

'But what can we do to stop this? I love my wife, and I don't want to see her go insane!'

'All power corrupts, and it is not you alone who would weep should the rings totally corrupt her. The world would be ended.'

'Great. But listen to me again. How. Do. We. Stop. This.'

'You must find the others rings. This map tells of the location of the Ring of Shadow, in the land that your people now call Spain. That is the best place to start. Should you gather all five rings, and unite them in one place, one of two things will occur.'

'Go on...'

'If the uniter is pure of heart, the power of the rings will be destroyed forever. Should they be evil though...'

'End of the world?'

'The legends are... not clear. But I think that it would be safe to assuem that it would not be good.'

'Piece of piss then. We get the rings and break them.'

'Would that it were so easy. Other powers in the world seek them, and this 'Britney Spears' you told me of is but the least of their agents. There will be others, you can be sure of that.'

'Can we expect them to be pop singers too? Or are we talking gun toting movie villains?'

'How should I know? I've been stuck here in Hawaii all my life. All I can tell you is that you should go at once.'

'But Megan, in her condition...'

'I am sure that she will awaken in time. The injuries to her mind, however...'

'Why don't you come with me? You're pure of heart, right? Megan can rest up here for a while, and then there's no danger.'

K'lashan raised her eyebrows. 'I thought that you loved her?'

'And being parted from her will hurt - but I'd much rather that than see her turn into a goddess of death and destruction in front of my eyes.'

'Good point.'
121212111222111211121211111211112111.title: More Exposition

121212111222111211121211111211112112.content:
It had taken her some time to get here in her condition, but it had been worth it. There was only one way for her to return to normal, and nothing would stop her. One of her minions had transported her this far, but she had dismissed him when she had seen the savages approaching. The two women had towered over her, each of their footsteps throwing up vast quantities of sand and causing her to keep her distance for fear of being crushed.

She was relieved when they finally left, making off with the man. Perfect, he was only a distraction, it was the rings that she wanted. But when she approached Megan, whose size was even greater than the others, she saw that there was no possible way that she could hope to remove them from her fingers. Luckily, she remembered what her old mentor had told her about their powers. While they enabled the wearer to grow or shrink themselves and others at will, anything worn by the targets was affected as well. So all that she had to do was hitch a ride and hope that Megan grew even bigger, thus making herself normal sized again. Then they would rue the day that they crossed Britney Spears!

She stopped herself from laughing maniacally just in time, and ran closer to the titanic form of the sleeping woman, secreting herself in the all too spacious area of her ear. All she need do now was wait and hope...

When morning came, it wasn't long until Megan discovered John missing...

choices: A furious storm appears out of nowhere, and the two get lost
Ninja Commander Brittany surfaces in her Trident submarine.
1212121112221112111212111112111122.content:
"Morning dear." Purred John at his lovely, if not slightly titanic, wife. "Sleep well?"

"All things considered - yeah." Megan's eyes struggled to focus. It suddenly snapped into her mind why her husband looked so damn strange - even to her half asleep brain. "You know it's not polite to walk on a ladies face."

Megan was lying on her back. John was straddling her nose, leaning on it's bridge. He playfully kissed her. "Even if that lady is my wife?"

She narrowed her eyes. "Doubly so - short stuff."

"What are you going to do about it?" John said smugly.

Vertigo engulfed him as the world spun around him. Suddenly he found himself at only a quarter of an inch tall. Of course his woman remained at fifty feet - so John unexpectedly found himself at the bottom of a wrinkle - perhaps at the corner of her mouth. Surrounded by a valley of flesh, he slumped to the ground defeated. "Ok - I give! I'll get off."

Seconds later, he was back to normal - or as normal as things could get in this very strange relationship. He slid down her chin and off her head.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Breakfast consisted of more local flora and fauna plucked from natures garden and warmed over the campfire.

"Rings of world domination - what the hell would someone want to put something like that together for?" John asked between bites.

"A different era, different way of thinking, I guess."

He finished off the last of his coconut milk. "So what do we do when we - I mean you get the whole set?"

Megan looked up from her plate. "What do you mean?"

"Oh come on - surely you must have at least entertained the idea, even slightly."

"What, you mean capitalizing on my new found God-Like Powers and seizing control of the planet? Why ever would I want to do that? Besides we don't know what the other three rings do. For all we know they might be the Ring of Eternal Turkey Basting, the Ring of Super Powered Taste - useful if a crime ever occurs in my mouth - and the Ring of Pauly Shore removal. On second thought - that last one might not be so bad."

John moved around to her side of the camp-fire. "But even if the last three rings are a bust, you've certainly got enough to work with. Being any size you want - that doesn't suck you know."

"Tell you what - lets wait until we get the rest of the set. Then we'll worry about the future."

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

It was about an hour later when the two set out back to the mainland. On the bridge, John leaned heavily on the wheel looking out over the horizon. His mind was awash with thoughts. "So I wonder how big you could get?"

" I have no idea. The last three weeks have been a whirlwind, so I've never had a chance to experiment with this thing." She pondered the cold metal band and jet black stone on her hand. "I mean that we can do a quarter of an inch tall, so you figure that the reverse would be true. A hundred feet? Five hundred? Several miles tall?"

"That's pretty big."

"Yeah. . . "

Sadly any further rumination was cast aside when suddenly. . .

Shink even smaller and hide
12121211122211121112121111121112.content:
As the sun slowly sank to the horizon, it cast a warm romantic glow about the island. John returned just a hour later, his arms full of dates and berries. They settled to the sand in front of their makeshift lean-to, underneath a canopy of palm trees. The camp fire brought a meager amount of light to the proceedings.

The salt air was warm and fragrant, filled with the smells of the sea tempered with the lush jungle behind them. The roll of the waves gently lapping at the shore the only sound for miles.

It was, in short, paradise.

Suddenly the forest around them exploded with activity as a dozen heavily armed (and sexy) female Ninjas clad in black (yet revealing) jumpsuits emerged from the bush. Some descended on ropes from the surrounding trees, while others erupted out of the surf in front of them. Instantly - soundlessly, the enemy agents surrounded the two lovers.

Moments later, the very earth beneath their feet began churning. A dozen feet to their right emerged a drilling machine, bursting out of the beach. The might drill on the nose of the craft came to a stop, and the hatch hissed open. Shrouded by steam and dust, a figure appeared at the head of the ramp.

Megan blinked. "Brittany? What the hell! We left you in a shoe box in a hotel room a hundred miles from here."

Wearing an efficient and functional (yet alluring and sexy) combat jumpsuit, the full sized Brittany Spears strode up to the pair. "You see - that was simply a drone agent cloned from imperfect DNA. I am, for all intents and purposes - the real McCoy."

"How did you find us?" John stammered out.

"Oh please, do you think that I would be so foolish to not have agents stationed outside the hotel?" she said with a dismissive wave of her hand. "After you left, it was a simple matter to follow you. And here we are."

"You evil bitch!"

"I know. But, back to our previous discussion: what will it be? Will you give me the ring or will we be forced to make you eat hot lead?"

John pondered for a moment- not at the offer, but at the fact that the mega-pop teen idol just said 'eat hot lead'. Very surreal indeed. He glanced to the two gunmen in the room - if they didn't play this right, things could get ugly.

"Enough stalling - give us the item." Brittany was sounding more and more like a gangster every moment.

It was Megan who eventually spoke up. "Ok, fine - we'll give you the ring."

Brittany nodded in approval. "Wise girl."

Megan struggled against the iron grip of the Ninja commando behind her. "Magilla the Gorilla will have to let go of me first - I cant very well retrieve it, if I cant reach it." Ninja Commander Spears nodded curtly, and the agent faded into the shadows with a bow.

Megan slowly rummaged through her sack, looking for the ring. Eventually she pulled out a small lock box - under the watchful eye of the goon squad.

"No tricks now." Brittany commanded. The Ninja agents all stood well back from the woman with the ring, knowing that any physical contact would mean their instant shrinkage.

Megan calmly walked forward, the ring sitting in the palm of her hand. Stopping next to John, she nodded. "No tricks, just magic."

In the blink of an eye, the two vanished out of sight. The commandos opened fire, but they were too slow. It was if the couple had never been there at all.

"Fuck!" Brittany barked out as the two melted away. Dropping to her hands and knees, she squinted at the sand. "Seal off the area! They're still here - we just have to find them."

Hidden amongst the massive boulders of sand all around them, John hugged his wife. "Slick move dear. You've bought us a bit more time."

She glanced around. For hundreds of miles in either direction stretched nothing but desolate sand as far as the eye could see. Well, that and a handful of several mile tall Ninja commandos and their musician leader. "Yeah, but only just a bit - eventually someone will find us."

John began laughing at the irony. "We started out our relationship by trying to make contact with a giant. Now we're desperately dogging being found."

"So now what?"

"We have to get out of here and go find us some treasure." Brittany's titanic face moved closer, eyes rapidly searching for the escaped couple.

"I'll bite - how?"

"Well, we could hitch a ride with the villainous musician," he said indicating the giant eye directly above him, "or we could get microscopic on them and wait until they leave. They'll never find us that way."
12121211122211121112121111121112.title: Return of Ninja Commander Spears

choices: The two jump for it
The two hand over the Ring, hoping to be spared
121212111222111211121211111211121.content:
'How to get onto her without her seeing us? There's only her hands, and she'll notice us if we -'

Megan was cut off by the rumbling of the ground around them. Britney's sharp eye, directly above John, had seen them, and their discussion had kept them in one place long enough for the only place they could have hitched a lift with her - her hand - to work its way underneath them.

Sand poured off to either side of them like an avalanche, and soon the immediate edges of their boulder strewn world were defined by even huger fingertips, and a truly titanic thumb. Britney's face loomed above, and spoke in a voice louder than thunder.

'I've clearly been too lenient with you up until now. So, I'm just going to kill you and take the Ring. I'll bet you didn't know that if the wearer of the Ring dies, the Ring will return to normal size. I do. I know all about it. I've had a very useful education, although you two put an end to my teacher. So anyways, all I have to do is kill you...'
121212111222111211121211111211121.title: Imminent Death

choices: They escape the fist
Brittany is sucessful at last
1212121112221112111212111112111211.content:
"All I have to do is kill you. . . ." boomed the voice of god, coming from all around them. With that proclamation still ringing in their ears, huge towers of flesh began to move closer, blackening the sky. John grabbed Meg's arm.

"Quick! Run!" he shouted, shoving her.

"Where!"

"Anywhere but here!"

It didn't even matter which side of Brittany's hand they were running to, or that they were faced with a several thousand foot drop once they got there - or that they were still surrounded by an army of mile tall Ninjas.

The first rule of crisis - one thing at a time.

Brittany smiled down upon the two half inch tall people in her palm, frantically scurrying about as she slowly closed her fist in around them. The slight flexing of her flesh beneath them causing no end of trouble to their progress. The simple action of standing up and bring her hand to chest level translating as a 8.8 earthquake. It was, simply, a an incredible rush and a quite the thrill."I think I could get into this whole 'world domination' thing" She continued to close her mighty fist around the two lovers.

Of course it didn't occur to her that like Auric Goldfinger or Ernst Stavros Blofeld before her, toying with the hero before killing them would inevitably lead to disaster. All she needed was a white Persian cat with a diamond studded collar to make her downfall complete.

Megan and John ran as the vast plain of soft springy flesh slowly turned into a valley and then into a tunnel. The walls slowly closed in all around them as they struggled on. The point of light in the distance grew smaller despite them running as hard and as fast as either of them could. They could see a field of golden hair just beyond - if they could make it, they could hide in her heir.

If they made it.

Boulders of sand came crashing down around them as Brittany moved in for the kill. The pair of micro-lovers leapt to safety just as the vengeful pop-singer clenched her fist one last time.
1212121112221112111212111112111211.title: The Closing Fist of Doom!

choices: Cool, a drilling machine...
S'pose we'd best save the world...
12121211122211121112121111121112111.content:
As they feefell away from the megalomaniac, Megan grinned at John.

'Not long now before my little surprise kicks in...'

'Huh?'

Then they were landing, the fall not a problem to people of their dimensions. John was slightly more puzzled about that.

'But even half inch tall people should feel something from a fall like that?' he gasped as they ran full pelt away from Britney's foot.

'Who said anything about us being half an inch tall?' Megan smiled back, pointing upwards.

John looked up, seeing the titaness Britney raging at her underlings, and something else, above her...

The ground rocked as feet stomped down, sending Britney and her ninjas sprawling, John and Megan sped past them all, and John saw the truth at last.

These feet were even bigger than those of the ninjas (some fifteen hundred feet tall, by his estimation); it was the ninjas that were half an inch tall, they were even smaller! (Some 0.09mm, Megan later told him). They, at their 'invisible to the naked eye' scale had nothing to fear. Britney, on the other hand...

'Look! This one looks like Britney Spears!' the girl shouted down the beach to her friends, scooping the pop princess up along with a handful of sand.

'Unhand me at once!' Britney screamed, for all the good that it would do.

As more and more pre teen girls (what was this, a school outing?) stormed down the beach to lay claim to their own living ninja dolls, John and Megan made their escape.

'Clever ideas like that, that's why I love you.' John said, pecking his wife on the cheek.

'Yeah sure, my tits and cheerleader outfit have nothing to do with it...'

Blushing, John changed the subject. 'So, how do we get away?'

'Well, when I shrank those bitches and us, I took the precaution of leaving their tunnelling machine regular size. We could grow back and make our getaway in style.'

All concept of identification was gone at their size, but they could still hear the laughs of the girls as they played.

'Or, we could wait until those kids have gone and get back to searching for that ring...'
12121211122211121112121111121112111.title: Betcha Didn't See THAT Coming...

choices: They return to normal size
Something is wrong
121212111222111211121211111211121111.content:
Making their way over grains of sand bigger than they were, John and Megan soon found themselves in the shadow of the digger. The entrance door still gaped open, but the step up was quite impossible at their scale.

'Going up...' smiled Megan, raising the Ring again.
121212111222111211121211111211121111.title: Big(ger) World

choices: The girl is young, around ten
The girl is older, around eighteen
1212121112221112111212111112111211112.content:
Nothing happened.

'Going up?' Megan tried again.

Still nothing was happening.

'Um, anytime now would be good...'

'Shut up, John! Sorry, it's just that - Oh, I don't know. I guess I overcharged the Ring or something. Shrinking us this small was too much for it...'

'So we're going to have to get the Ring of Growth after all? Digging through this sand could take us years.'

'Then we'll have to get some help...'

John followed her gaze. Britney, vast and terrible Britney, had somehow escaped, and was running towards them, her huge feet throwing up sand. Behind her, something so great that it defied comprehension, a kilometres tall girl, walked in pusuit, calmly keeping pace with the tiny singer.

'Britney? She'll just kill us!' John protested, following Megan as she started jumping from grain to grain, straight towards Ms Spears.

'No she won't. She needs the Ring to get back to normal size as much as we do. All we've got to do is contact her, and through her someone big enough to dig!'

Britney was having problems. Now she had reached the edge of the area that Megan had shrunk, and the end of the small expanse of sand that was still at her scale. As she reached the normal sized sand, she stumbled over the, to her, rock sized grains and went sprawling.

'No, no, no.' she said, raising her head.

As she did, she saw that, between her spread fingers, stood those two architects of her demise. If she was to die, at least she's take them with her. She prepared to crush them, but noticed that they weren't resisting, just standing there. Another trick? No, if they were in control of the Ring, they wouldn't risk themselves like this.

So, they'd lost control. They were in a worse position than her. Treating them to her biggest grin, she closed her hand around them once again, secreting them deep into one of the many hidden pockets of her ninja outfit. She could deal with them later. First, she had to get out of this -

The world erupted around her. In her reverie, she had neglected to pay attention to her pursuer. Fingers were thrusting up from around her, as a whole handful of the world was scooped up by the girl. Had John and Megan been present, they may have had a sense of deja vu. As it was, Britney had a thrill of fear as she looked up into that face, wondering what lay in store for her. All of her thralls were gone now, either carried off by others, or accidently crushed in the scrum.

The girl stood alone, her friends having departed. Her tanned form was dressed in a pink bikini, doubtless sunbathing somewhere further along the beach before the noise of the drill brought her over to investigate. Britney tried to look beyond the difference in scale, to guess how old this girl was, and what she wanted with her. It was hard to tell, what with the fact that she had to crane her neck around to see either side of the face.
1212121112221112111212111112111211112.title: A Need For Reconciliation

choices: Britney gets John and Megan to tell her where the Ring of Growth is, then tells
Britney stalls Christina, hoping to escape or be rescued
12121211122211121112121111121112111122.content:
Britney felt a lurch of fear when she realised who it was. It wasn't the girl that had been holding her before. It was someone else. The face that looked down at her at that moment belonged to Christina Aguilera.

Shit.

Christina laughed. Long and loud, how she laughed! Britney tried to block it out, but it was no use when she was only half an inch tall and held in the woman's hand. Eventually, though, the laughter ended and the talking began. This was nearly as bad.

'So, what're you doing down there, Brit?' her rival asked mockingly, jiggling her hand up and down as she spoke to send her rolling around. 'I thought that you knew how to use the Ring, but I guess that you're just inferior to me in that respect too.'

Britney would have answered, with a much more scathing remark to boot, but she wasn't given an opportunity.

'Where is it, anyway? It's obvious that you have it, and since you are so incompetent, it's only right and proper that it should belong to us.'

Us? Britney was caught out for a second, but then realised who she meant. While she herself had been raised alone by her benefactor, he had not been alone in his desire for the Ring. He had had a sister, and they were great rivals, almost as great as Britney and Christina. The sister had taken not one apprentice but four. They too had worked their way into the music industry, seperately at first but recently coming together in collaboration.

The sister called herself Missy Elliot these days, and her agents were the four that had collectively been the Moulin Rouge; Christina, Pink, Li'l Kim and Mya. And if one of them had been following Britney, it meant that the others couldn't be far behind. In her present condition, she was hardly in a position to stop them...
12121211122211121112121111121112111122.title: The Third Faction

choices: '- can lead you to them!'
'- know where the Ring of Growth is!'
121212111222111211121211111211121111222.content:
'Of course I don't have the Ring!' Britney bellowed. 'Do you think I'd be sitting here, this small, if I had control? Somebody else has it!'

'Do they now?' Christina said slowly, her expression hardening. 'Then it looks like I have no more need for you, eh?'

The fingers around Britney began to flex, and then descend, harbingers of death. Christina smiled again, taking delicious delight at the thought of finally putting an end to her biggest -or smallest - rival.

'Wait!' Britney shouted. 'I -'
121212111222111211121211111211121111222.title: No Mercy

choices: Christina and Pink take the Ring
Christina and Pink fight over the Ring
1212121112221112111212111112111211112221.content:
The crushing force ceased, briefly. Christina raised her eyebrows, as did the other titaness peering over her shoulder; another member of Elliot's cabal - Pink.

"So talk. Fast."

Britney dug around in her pocket for her tiny nemeses, before offering them up to the huge faces above. Christina was forced to raise her hand, bringing Britney up right in front of her awesome eye, its iris alone bigger than the girl. A blink almost knocked Britney from her feet, but then a rumbling indicated an intake of breath.

"You see 'em?" Pink asked.

In the palms of her inch-tall rival, smaller than the grains of sand all around her, Christina could just make out two humanoids.

"Get them to give it to us, then." she said, simply.

Her roar was loud to Britney; deafening to the other two. Having just been rudely awoken from the unconsciousness that Britney's snatching had put them into, they awoke into a world of gods. Britney was a giantess, yes, but even she was as nothing to these others, others who could balance the two of them on the tip of an eyelash with room to spare.

"Give them the Ring." Britney said.

Megan peered up at the smaller titaness in bewilderment. "Won't... do any... good, I'm afraid." she gasped. "Out of power."

"But there is the Ring of Growth..." John ventured.

***

Soon, Pink was digging away at the sand, searching for the Ring without pausing for anything - except occassionally to bitch about being the only one digging. Christina stood by and watched, Britney sitting in the palm of her left hand. John and Megan, in turn, were in hers.

"It's all over, John." Megan wept. "When they find it, we're doomed, and so is the world."

"I don't think so." John offered as comfort. "There's always hope, and if I know my villains, they're going to have an argument very soon..."

Speaking quietly, they had little to fear of Britney overhearing them, much less the goddesses that held their giantess captive. Bitney herself had other plans whiring through her mind. She could get to the Ring as it was uncovered, before anyone else, if she moved fast enough...

There was a cry of joy from the hole - some six foot deep now - as Pink unearthed a chest of some sort. Christina moved closer to get a look at it. Pink crushed the lock binding it with her bare hands, magically boosted strength helping. The lid opened, to reveal the Ring of Growth, with its emerald gem and silver filigree design. Christina smiled in triumph.
1212121112221112111212111112111211112221.title: Plot Developments

choices: Pink wins
Christina wins
1212121112221112111212111112111211112221.content:
Christina paced closer.

"Give it to me." she ordered.

"Actaully, I think that I should the one to wear it first." Pink answered. "After all -"

She didn't get a chance to say any more before Christina was upon her, diving into the hole with an expression of rage etched onto her features. Britney tumbled from her hand just as the case containing the Ring of Growth tumbled from Pink's. Both landed in the sand at the feet of the giantesses as they began to wrestle.

Britney scurried about hurridly, avoiding the stomping feet all around. Occassionally, one or the other of her enemies would be thrown violently to the floor, sending sand flying in all directions; Ms Spears along with it.

If she could only reach the Ring, she'd be able to get out of this. But every time she got close to it, another tremor would cast her through the air, away from her objective.

And she'd forgotten about John and Megan...

***

If the fight was bad for Britney, it was a nightmare for our two heroes. At a size where a mere footstep was the equivalent of an atomic bomb blast, a wrestling match was beyond imagination. They just had to hang tight and hope that it ended soon...
1212121112221112111212111112111211112221.title: Fight for the Ring

1212121112221112111212111112111211112221.content:
In the end, Christina's psychotic approach to fighting - scrabbling like a wild cat - was no match for the practiced experience that Pink brought to the bout. Leaving her rival unconscious in the sand - and mere inches from crushing Britney, Megan and John beneath her - she scooped up the case and ripped it open.

"Nothing!" she screamed. "Where's the Ring of Growth?"

"Where it belongs."

Pink looked up from the bottom of the hole that she'd dug, in the direction that the foreignly accented voice had come. Looking down at her was Shakira, her long blue dress catching in the Hawaiian breeze. She held a many-ringed hand up in front of her face for the villainess to see.

"I dug this thing up years ago, but kept it quiet. Now that there are people that know of it, I think I'd better bury the matter again."

Before Pink's stunned gaze - the smaller people nearby unable to comprehend what was going on - Shakira expanded in size, her head blocking out the sun and casting all into shadow.

"Lucky that my breasts are small and humble," she mumbled, cupping them with a smirk, "so you don't mistake them for mountains."

Giving no time for those below her to appreciate her lame joke, she scuffed at the sand with her bare foot, scattering a tide of it into the hole, filling it up. To be on the safe side, she stomped down on the area a few times before she returned to normal and walked away. Her secret was safe once more, so when she decided to make proper use of the ring it would be a total surprise...
1212121112221112111212111112111211112221.title: Shakira

choices: John and Megan are washed off as well
John and Megan stay with Christina
1212121112221112111212111112111211112222.content:
"Oh you do, do you?" Christina laughed, pausing only momentarily in her crushing. "If you did, I'm sure that you'd have used it on yourself, you fool!"

"Whatcha doin'?" asked another, equally loud voice. Through what little space available through Christina's hand, Britney could see that someone else was approaching.

It was another member of Elliot's cabal: Pink.

"Oh, I see now. Squish her good!"

Britney screamed again, but that was it as the walls of flesh crushed the life from her. John and megan may well have survived, but now they were lost and alone, tiny in a world beyond their comprehension. And caught in the sticky remains of a half-inch tall Britney Spears, stuck to the hand of Christina Aguilera. Not an everyday situation.

"Now stop messin' around." Pink snarled. "We're running out of time to find those Rings!"

"At least give me a moment to clean my fucking hand!" Christina screamed, waving it above her head.
1212121112221112111212111112111211112222.title: Death of a Diminutive Giantess

choices: Britney
12121211122211121112121111121112112.content:
While in movies the gloating villains always got their comeuppance, the sad fact was that the real world wasn't always that way. John and Megan found this out as Ms. Spears' hand squished them to a pulp, allowing her to take the ring and commence her plans for world domination.

This is the end, unless of course you want to follow Britney on her tour of conquest.
12121211122211121112121111121112112.title: Villainy's Triumph

choices: The pair escape
Britney puts them with the world leaders
1212121112221112111212111112111212.content:
Much time had passed. John and Megan were quaking where they sat, in a tiny cell hanging from a chain around Britney Spears' neck. It wasn't the fact that they were so tiny, or that they were in her clutches, that frightened them so much.

It was where she was.

Our two heroes may have been miniscule, but so was our villain. She currently stood half an inch high, sneaking past the enormous foot of a secret service agent. This was the last obstacle, the last danger to be avoided before she recovered the last item that she needed.

The door was open just enough for her to sneak through. Within, the crest of the President of the United States of America dominated the vast carpet that lay before her. At the far end, so very far, was a mountainous edifice that could only be the desk of the man himself.

Concentrating for a moment, Britney channelled her will through the Ring, growing in size until she was restored to her full height. Megan and John grew with her, but remained relatively tiny within their cage.

The president got to his feet, spluttering with indignation.

"Where-"

Britney wagged a finger at him, smiling cruelly. the jewel on the Ring of that finger glowed, and the president vanished.

By the time the secret service agent entered the room, Britney was gone as well.

***

The president awoke to find himself surrounded by other world leaders, from every country that he knew, and a few that he couldn't remember.

The room was nondescript, but he didn't have much time to get used to it before a rumbling heralded the ceiling being removed.

Looking up, he found himself staring into the gigantic face of Britney Spears again.

Her voice, when she spoke, was like the word of God.

"Right, now that I've got you all here, I can explain myself. The world is, like, totally messed up, and you guys have done nothing to help it. The only solution to war and famine is for me to take control of the world, for its own good. So I've shrunk you all down and brought you here to bring you around to my way of thinking. Is there anyone that doesn't agree with my plan?"

Those that could understand english muttered approval.

John and Megan realised at the same moment what Britney's evil intention was.

"We've got to stop her." John said.

"But how?" Megan reasoned. "We're trapped here, with no hope of escape. And even if we did manage to get away, we're still half an inch tall."

"We'll worry about that later. For the moment, I've managed to break the lock. We can at least get away from this maniac."
1212121112221112111212111112111212.title: Plan into Action

choices: John and Megan try to escape when Britney falls asleep
John and Megan grow and try to talk to her
121212111222111211121211111211122.content:
Unfortunately, as Britney's eye was above John as the couple miniaturised, she saw where they were. All she got was a handful of sand. Still, when poured into a police evidence bag handed to her by a flunkie she had them right where she wanted them.

Shooing the minion away to prepare her transport for departure, Britney returned her attentions to her captives.

'If you can hear me in there, then you'd better make yourselves seen, and quickly.' she whispered, rubbing sand between finger and thumb through the bag, hoping that the tiny duo were experiencing at least a mild discomfort. 'I could always chuck this bag into a fire. You's die soon enough, and I could always extract the Ring later.'

There was no immediate reply, but she wasn't expecting one. 'I'll give you a while to think it over. Still, I gotta thank you two for gettin' rid of that stuffy old guy. He was my mentor, y'know, he like, totally helped to bring me up and teach me about the Ring, but he kinda got boring recently. And all too soon we must set aside childish things...'

Like her virginity. Soon she would have her victory, and with it she would also cast aside the shackles of her celibacy. While Ms Spears lusted after the ring for its power as much as the next person, she also needed it to circumvent the curse.

It had been invoked as a failsafe by the old guy, her tutor, to keep her under control. She could not make love until she had touched the ring, used its power. He had taken a part of her from her, and it probably qualified as some kind of childhood trauma. But Britney knew that she was perfectly sane.

But she would still make the world pay.
121212111222111211121211111211122.title: Now You See Them...

choices: They find out that she is not pregnant.
She is pregnant...
121212111222111211121211112.content:
Megan and John have a fantastic honeymoon in Hawaii, enjoying the sand and the surf. Their rather bizarre shrinking episode had bacome nothing but a faded memory, though they occasionally made jokes about it.

Upon returning home, John and Megan returned to real life, to stable jobs and the duties of married living. However, Megan who had tested positive for a pregnancy test was starting to become worried. She had done the test almost four months before and her belly had yet to become visibly bigger. In fact, she doubted it at first and decided not to mention it to John, but now she was having the classic episodes of morning sickness and the likes. In doubt, she decided to tell John. Upon hearing the news, John is slightly troubled and decides to take Megan to see a doctor.
121212111222111211121211112.title: Pregnant?

choices: A number of years later...
1212121112221112111212111122.content:
"What the...? Triplets? But..." shouts a bewildered John.
" I'm afraid so, but they are rather tiny, in fact, they seem to be no more than half an inch in size...,"replied the doctor," Its the weirdest thing..." he continues.
"Oh My Goodness! Thats not right..." says Megan.
"Do you mean to say that my kids are no bigger than my thumb?" she continues.
"Well, in reality they would probably fit snugly, all of them, on your thumb," replied the doctor.

Hearing the news, John and Megan could only think of one explanation. The curse of the ring had not left them, its effect had been merely lifted from them. Nevertheless, being the strong-willed people that they were, they kept the babies and several months later, Megan gave birth to three healthy babies, a girl and two boys.
1212121112221112111212111122.title: Tiny?

choices: Continue from the triplets point of view
Continue from the parents point of view
12121211122211121112121111221.content: Having a bunch of tiny kids proved to be a real challenge for John and Megan who had to constantly look out for their tiny offspring. Nevertheless, Megan was a great mom and John was a doting dad and their kids recieved the best from their parents. Unfortunately, their diminutive size left many things unaccesible to them, but they learnt. In fact, to put their minds at rest as to their condition, John and Megan sat them down one day and told them the amazing adventures they had and the extraordinary story of how John met Megan. Upon hearing about their dad's escapades, the kids realised that there was a whole wide world out there wating for them to explore it.
12121211122211121112121111221.title: Tim, Emma and Nigel

choices: Small once more
12121211122211121112122.content:
Megan awoke with a shot, consciousness flooding back to her limp body. Her blurry eyes trying to focus on whatever happened to be focused in front of her. As reality regained it's former sharp edge, she realized it was a sea of brown - some kind of leather. It was hard and worn, probably quite some years old.

She realized that she was laying down. Trying to move, her arms betrayed her. Her legs were no better, also on strike. A thousand pins and needles jabbed her all over her body. She closed he eyes again, gathering strength.

With a willpower previously unknown to man, she managed to lever herself over, and opened her eyes. Filling her field of vision was the red-haired visage of Theresa. Then it hit Megan - Theresa was her size. More importantly, she was Theresa's size.

Megan was back to normal!

She sat up, the squeak of leather beneath her. She realized that she lay on the couch in the front room of Ray's Occult. The sun shone brightly through the front window, illuminating the area with a warm yellow glow. Sitting across from her were both Anita and Theresa, looking on in interest. In a flash, the macro-cheerleader threw her arms wide and wrapped them around the red-head.

"You've been asleep for an hour. We were starting to get worried." Anita said, handing her a cup of tea.

"Where's John."

"Right here." Theresa said, pointing to the side of her head. "He's been pacing up and down my ear canal for this whole time."

"What? Why didn't it work on him?" she demanded, moving into a sitting position. "It should have worked too."

Anita rapped her knuckles on a musty textbook before her. "I'm trying to figure that out. By all accounts, it should have worked " she pointed to Megan's left hand. "Why don't you try it out - make sure it we've got it right."

"Huh?" she asked.

"The ring." Megan lifted her hand, the ring on her middle finger. "You should have full and complete control of the Powers of Alkazar."

"Right." She stood up, looking at the ring. "What do I do?"

"How should I know?" she said with a shrug. "You're the master of the ring - you figure it out."

Closing her eyes, Megan began to think small. How she arrived at what constituted small is left for a philosophy forum, but think she did. A tremor ran through her body, as suddenly the strange tingling sensation overtook her again. . . .
12121211122211121112122.title: Normal is a relitive term

choices: She plays a trick on John
She plays it straight and goes to meet him.
121212111222111211121221.content:
Megan opened her eyes, to the two giants watching in fascination. She looked around -everything was bigger than she was, but not quite as much as she expected. Anita kneeled and moved closer, holding up a ruler behind Megan. She topped out at just above three inches..

"I'm not as small as I used to be," the miniature woman said. "What happened?"

"You're the one in control of the ring - you tell me. You've got full mastery of it's power, remember. Well, more like control - the mastery part you don't seem to have yet."

"Full control?"

"Any one, any thing, any size, for as long as you want - it's all you." She shrugged. "Once you learn how to work the thing, that is."

She took a couple of steps towards the giant redhead. "I probably should go see John."

Theresa lowered her hand, palm up. Calmly, the reduced cheerleader took a step up into her palm and walked forward. Settling cross-legged into the soft surface beneath her, Megan tried again with the ring. This time, the magic came easily to her, dropping height and melting away like an ice cube. Theresa brought her hand close to her face to watch the process.

When Megan had returned to her former height of just under half an inch, Theresa curled her fingers and brought her hand next to her ear. Megan jumped into the soft folds of skin, landing safely. Turning to watch the hand disappear from sight, she stood up. Moments later, she walked into the cavernous opening. . . .
121212111222111211121221.title: Under control

choices: The story follows John . . .
The story followsMegan . . . .
121212111222111211122.content:
Theresa stepped out of the bookstore and hung a right, walking down the city street. She was hoping to find a coffee shop or diner to kill a couple of hours in - but she was having no luck. This was not the best part of town. She looked up at the sky - the sun was quickly setting, and dark and heavy clouds were drawing closer. Rain was coming on.

A shiver ran up and down her spine as she walked. She drew her long jacket around her, closing up the front. She subconsciously chalked the shiver up to one of her guests in her ear moving about, or a touch of the night cold. She didn't know that evil eyes were upon her. . .

* * * * * * *


"Do you think she'll be able to reverse the process?" Meg said, watching the street go by. The pair had moved to Theresa's outer ear, to afford her some privacy and get some quality time alone. The coming night chill brought the two closer together, as the huddled in a fold on Theresa's ear.

"She sounded like she knew what she was doing - so if anyone can, it'll be her." A long silence passed between the two, as they simply held each other.

"Megan, what happens when we get back to normal?"

"What do you mean?"

"I mean between us. Over the last couple of days, I've grown closer to you than anybody I've known before - and I don't mean because I was inside you once."

"Do we go back to normal, you mean?"

He looked her in the eyes. "Well, yeah. We've always operated in different circles - you've got a rich family, I've got . . . well, me. We're about as far apart as two people can get."

"And this makes a difference how?"

John was coming up with a suitable answer when suddenly shouting drowned out the world. There was a violent shaking, and more screaming - then the loudest noise yet, and the world came crashing down around them.

* * * * * * *


"Yo! She-bitch!" came the shout behind Theresa. She spun around to see the bald man missing several teeth standing in the middle of the sidewalk. He had tattoos running up and down his arm, and a nasty attitude. She spun back around to see the skinny guy in the leather jacket step out of the shadows.

"Hey momma. Whatcha got, hmm?" he pulled out a knife, flicking it open. "How about some money."

She was too scared to talk, meekly offering the purse to the man. He snatched it from her grip and ripped it open. "Ten FUCKING dollars? That's it, you lousy cunt!" he shouted, throwing the wad of money to the ground. "You insult us with that! I said WHERE IS TH' FUCKIN' MONEY!"

"Tha-tha-that's all I have."

A pain ripped through her gut. She cocked her head to the not-so-distant sound of thunder. The storm must almost be upon us, she thought - but it was simply the tattooed man behind her with the revolver. She collapsed to her knees, and fell to her side.

"Aw, shit - what'd you go and do that for!"

"Wasnt I supposta?"

"Moron! Money first - then gun! Get it right next time, you useless fuck." He picked up the fallen purse. "Well, lets see what she's got."

* * * * * * *


"Ohmygodohmygodohmygod!" Megan screamed, as the pair hit the ground. The impact knocked them out of the ear and both apart. Moments after landing, John ran over to Meg. "Oh god - we have to do something!"

John watched in anger, fists clenched as he watched the giant man in the leather jacket rummage through Theresa's purse. "I'm open to suggestions!"

Megan moved around Theresa's head, catching a glimpse of her prone body. She quickly ran back to her companion. "It looks bad - she needs medical help."

"I don't think that's going to be forthcoming. Just look at the neighborhood." He gestured all around him.

"So what do we do?"

"I don't know about you - but I'm going after them."

"What?!? Are you crazy? What the hell do you intend to do to them - tie the shoelaces together?"

John took a couple of steps closer to the murderers. "I don't know what I can do - but I can make sure they dont get away." He turned to Megan. "Are you coming?"

"I . . . I cant"

"I didn't expect so."

"No - it's not that. I don't want to leave Theresa. If she dies, she doesn't need to die alone."

"I understand." John brought the micro-cheerleader in close, embracing her. "Look, if we do this - we may never see each other again."

"Nonsense - we've got destiny on our side, remember?" She kissed him. "Now get going."

Without another word, John turned to hurry off to catch up to the criminals before him. Megan turned and slowly climbed back into Theresa's body for one last time . . .
121212111222111211122.title: Into Crime Alley

choices: - gone!
- ventured back into Theresa's body!
1212121112221112111221.content:
So here you are, Johnathan Lemeul Stone, twenty one years old and twenty five millimetres high, alone in the dark of the night, pursuing a pair of muggers who have just attacked the only hope that you have for reversing your predicament, and it has started to rain.

The water droplets explode around you like shells from some war movie. Should you suffer the misfortune of a direct hit, you can be sure that it would have much the same effect. Even more dangerous, giants are rushing around, seeking shelter from the sudden storm, their feet threatening death. In the chaos, you cannot discern in which direction your targets have gone. They too will be running, at a pace far greater than anything you could hope to achieve, and with a head start from the time you spent talking to Megan. You haven't a hope in Hell of catching them. Megan was right, this was quite pointless. You're a fool for ever thinking otherwise.

Ah, it's the rain. It always makes you melancholy, and that's when you were regular sized. You turn to make your way back to the alley, where you are at least under cover. When you get there, you find that Megan has -
1212121112221112111221.title: In Pursuit

choices: Run!
Implore the woman for help
12121211122211121112211.content:
Gone? But where? Theresa still lies where she fell, her form no less daunting for its inertness. Maybe Megan went to get help. But that didn't make sense, she said that she'd wanted to be here when - if- anything happened to -

There is an impact behind you, and you spin to see a mammoth boot. Then something engulfs you, and all goes black.

***

You awaken upon your impact with the table. You push yourself up and see the handkerchief that you had been imprisoned in. High above you can see the face of your captor, and a chill runs through you. It's the leather jacketed man that attacked Theresa! He must have doubled back or something after running off. Does that mean that he knows where Megan is?

You only need to look to one side to see the answer. Your equally diminished cheerleader companion is also getting to her feet. The embrace that you share upon seeing each other is worth more than any reconciliation speech.

'I'm going for a drink with the boys.'

The voice, slurred and yet commanding all at once, is that of Leather Jacket. You crane your neck upwards, but see that he is not addressing you.

'Make sure that nothin' happens to them, okay? There's money there. If anything's gone wrong, I'll fuckin' kill you, got it?'

He turns and walks off, leaving the (relatively) small room that you are in. You are still wondering who he was talking to when you are alerted by sound to your right. You turn, seeing the fingers, nails bright red, grinding out the last embers of a cigarette in a glass ashtray taller than you. For a moment you have a horrible thought of what it would be like to be that cigarette, pinched cruelly between finger and thumb and twisted this way and that until your spark went out.

Your eyes follow the wrist into the depths of a pink dressing gown, its cuffs and neck decorated with a fluffy trimming. What little you can see of the layer beneath, you guess that the woman is wearing a black nightdress. Her face, not as high as the man's since she is sitting down on a couch next to the table, is the focus though.

She being an arm's length from you (her arm's length), you don't have to strain quite so hard to see it. Framed by greasy lengths of blonde hair, the roots being brown, it is made up to a similar degree as the nails. All the mascarra and lip gloss can't hide the black eye, bruise and split lip that she bears, though. Presumably her relationship with Leather Jacket isn't the best.

Now her left hand is reaching out, and for a moment you fear that she means to kill you in just the manner that you feared. Then you see the fingers coil around the thirty foot tall glass that lies opposite the ashtray, with you between the two. As she lifts it up, causing you to marvel at her strength to so easily heft such a monolith, you notice the brown coloured spirit swirling around inside it. Is she drinking to kill the pain?

Megan tugs at your arm. 'We have to go.' she says, the fear apparant in both her face and voice. Up until recently, this whole experience had been fun for her. Now the grim realities of your situation are coming down hard, and she is panicing.

True, Theresa is still out there, probably undiscovered and dying. But even if you find your way down from this table and out of the house, you're still going to be hard pressed to find the alley again.

You could always try and get this woman to help you. Surely she bears no love for that man anymore, and would only be to glad to do some good. On the other hand, she may fear him enough to obey him, and keep you here until he gets backand his plan for you can be put into operation.

Megan pulls at you again. Decision time.
12121211122211121112211.title: Under Duress

choices: She's cruel
She's kind
121212111222111211122111.content:
The two of you run without looking back, hoping to reach the edge before she even notices, caught up with her drink.

Then there is a slam, and you run straight into something hard. But there's nothing there! You look across at Megan to see that she has suffered similarly. Behind her, though, you can see a subtle distortion, and realise what has happened. The woman finished her drink, and has now trapped you both beneath the glass. Looking up, you can make out an impression of her fingers through the concave bottom.

Then you are hit hard. You have to get and up keep running to avoid being pushed mercilessly along as she drags the glass along the table towards herself. She finally lifts it when you are right by the edge, and you see her large green eyes looking directly at you.

'Well, ain't you just the prettiest little thing?' she says, nudging Megan with the tip of her finger.

'Of course, one day someone will come along and take that beauty from you...' Now the finger knocks Megan over, and is gently pressing down on her prone form. She is unable to scream, her mouth smothered.

You run up to try and help, to try and pull the finger off, no matter how hopeless it is. Suddenly the finger is lifted off, and instead knocks you down, with the force of a speeding juggernaut truck. As the warm mass presses, the very faintest of forces upon your body, you hear the woman speak again.

'That's right, it's men like you that take our beauty. Well, not this time, you little bastard.'

You feel confident that you could roll out from under this gentle incarceration, if you did so you can be sure that she would quickly crush you, no matter what the man's warnings were. You'll just have to wait and see what she has in store for you.
121212111222111211122111.title: An Abusive Relationship

choices: Meg interferes
The giantess has a drink
1212121112221112111221111.content:
More warm flesh impacts from the side, and the thumb moves to take you up between itself and the finger that is laying on top of you. You are lifted effortlessly into the air, compacted between two masses of skin and blood covered bone. The pain is intense, and the woman pauses to roll you between her digits every few seconds, mangling you even more.

'This is where you get yours, you little bastard,' she says, and then lets go.

The mercy of being released from her grip is fleeting, as you plunge through the air to land in something wet. It breaks your fall, but as your head plunges under the surface and you get some in your mouth, you realise what it is.

Whiskey.

She's dropped you into her glass, and is now looking down upon you from on high, a crooked smile canyoning her face.

'Jake's gone out for a drink with the boys, so I don't see why you should miss out,' she smirks.

Her humongous hand reaches out for the glass. You desperately try to swim to the side to climb out, but the smooth sides are unscalable, and the small amount of alcohol you've already imbibed is more than enough to make your half-inch tall self drunk. There's no hope...
1212121112221112111221111.title: Whiskey

choices: She climbed the left passage
She climbed the right passage
121212111222111212.content:
"So let me get this straight - you're been accidentally shrunk - taking my husband's bitch of a sister with you. You get into my wine glass to try and get my attention - but I wind up drinking you instead. Then you proceed to violate my body by climbing around inside me? Then you trick me into puking you back up? And you think I've possibly still got one person somewhere inside me?"

John sat next to Theresa's eardrum, legs folded under him, listening to the playback. "Yeah, that's about it."

"Then to top it all off, you want me to help you?"

"Well, yeah - that was the idea."

"You're kidding, right?"

"Um . . ." This wasn't going well.

"You can just ride around in my stomach, use me as you see fit - and then expect me to bend over backwards to help you when you're FINALY ready to come out?"

"That's not quite -"

"Shut up. I'm still not done. To hell with you - and to hell with my sister in law, wherever the fuck she winds up at."

"But -"

"In fact - get out of my ear. I'm going to send you to join her myself."

Long silence.

"Well? Get out of there, you pigmy!"

"Let me think about this for a second. You sound angry -"

"You got that right, you microscopic moron."

"And you're probably going to do all kinds of unpleasant things to me when I leave your ear canal?"

"You have the idea, you brainless micro-man."

"But as long as I stay here, you can't get at me, right."

Dead silence.

"Now, who's more stupid - the moron or the moron who told him was a dead man BEFORE he left the ear canal?

Dead silence. A few minutes pass - and then suddenly the ear canal is nothing but chaos. Violent shaking, accompanied by curses of all sorts are all John knows. It's like being on the set of the Exorcist, but played at fast forward. Theresa does everything she can to dislodge the microscopic man inside her - jumping up and down, shouting, shaking her head from side to side, slamming her head into a wall - but to no avail.

As the fury leaves her, the rage subsiding, reality returns to normal for the tiny being. John's grip subsides; slowly he lets go of the wall he was clinging to.

"Now, lets have some ground rules." He says, brushing himself down.

"What the hell are -"

"Please don't interrupt me. I wasn't finished."

"Fuck you!"

Instead of responding, John very calmly pulled his ballpoint pen out of his leather jacket pocket. He jammed the pen home, putting a nearly microscopic hole in Theresa's ear drum - the slightest of pin pricks to the titanic female, nearly insignificant on the grand scale of things. Theresa however dropped to her knees, howling in pain and clutching the side of her head.

"So, do we have an understanding?"

"Oh, we do, you son of a bitch. Don't worry - you'll slip up sooner or later . . ."

* * * * * * *

Megan awoke in her sleeping bag, on a hot summers morning. The air was hot and the inside of the tent was extremely humid. She hadn't slept very well, since there was several hard stones poking her in the back all night long.

This is the heaviest, wettest sleeping bag I've ever been in. . .

Her eyes snapped open, her senses returning to her - this was no sleeping bag! This was someone's tongue! Those were no rocks - those were the back of Theresa's molars! The events came flooding back to her, and she remembered where she was. They had gotten Theresa to puke them back up, and she must have gotten lodged somewhere.

She rolled over very carefully, trying to move as little as possible. Her hands sunk into Theresa's gum line as she tried to wedge herself clear. It was no good - thousands of pounds of tongue kept her in place. She had to wiggle out the top, instead of pulling herself forward.

And then she was deafened by the loudest noise she had ever heard. Louder than the time her Daddy arranged the Rolling Stones to play at her birthday party. Louder than the family jet - and all Theresa did was talk.

By the time she had gotten used to the incredible cacophony that accompanied a simple sentence, she had missed most of the conversation.

"To hell with you - and to hell with my sister in law, wherever the fuck she winds up at."

That didn't sound good. It seems that Theresa was pissed that they had used her body as a playground. Even better - Theresa didn't know where she was. Perhaps I can use this to my advantage.

Then the entire mouth got turned upside down, as the mammoth woman attempted to dislodge her boyfriend. Fortunately the tongue held her in place. And then - stalemate. She laid there, attempting to figure out how to get out of Theresa's mouth, when a wicked idea occurred to her.

There was no way to pull this off without the giant knowing where she was at - but there was no way to stop her from going there, if she was fast enough. If Theresa managed to swallow first, or hold her breath just right - or any other of a dozen pitfalls her body incidentally might throw at her, she was dead. If she got what little she remembered of her anatomy wrong, she was dead - but if it worked, it would break the stalemate.

Megan slowly, carefully wiggled out from under Theresa's tongue.

"Ah ha!" the giant said, as Megan got clear and started sprinting for the back of the giant throat. Theresa rolled her tongue and coughed as the tiny tickle made it's way to the back of her throat. She hacks and exhales - sending a gale force storm up her windpipe - but the little woman was just too fast for her.

She leapt to the back of her throat, finding purchase on the slimy red wall of flesh. Megan stole a quick glance back at the opening of the mouth as it parted. A titanic finger the size of an office building entered the mouth and proceeded directly for her. Instead of letting go and falling into her gullet and safety, Meg started climbing. Within seconds, she was out of range of the finger and into the safety of the sinuses.

"Come back here, bitch." Theresa commanded - but it was no use. Megan was already climbing.

The passage narrowed - the winds increased as Theresa tried to exhale her out. A random though passed through her brain - We've never actually figured out how small we are, but it's gotta be smaller than the original 1/2 of an inch estimate - I'd never be able to fit up here otherwise.

She reached the passage she had been looking for - a small opening high in the nasal passage. She shook her head, unable to remember what it was called, but she DID remember that this pressure equalization mechanism proceeded directly to the inner ear - where it sounded like where John was.

A 50-50 chance. She only hoped that she go the correct passage . . .
121212111222111212.title: The typical "Vengeful, Abusive Giantess Scenar

choices: Occult specialist. Only the paranormal can help us now!
Scientist! Modern medicine has a cure for everything!
1212121112221112121.content:
With all her might, Megan squeezed through the tiny opening.

*ARGH* "What the hell are you doing, you stupid whore!" Megan heard the giant cry - but she ignored her. She kicked her legs and twisted for all she was worth, working her way into the small tube. It looked like a undersized sewer, but fleshy and moist. Once past the opening, she barely had enough room to move - but it was enough.

She wriggled along the tunnel through Theresa's head for a little under half an hour. Constant roars of pain reverberated throughout the skull, mixed with constant shaking and shuddering comprised the journey. But finally, she popped out at the end.

Before her was a conch shape, several small tendons and the tiniest bones in the human body - although they looked quite large to the shrunken cheerleader.

"What . . .what are you doing, bitch!" Theresa managed to gasp out between moans of pain. She couldn't feel her moving any more and was growing concerned.

"Oh, shut up you loudmouth." She finally shouted.

"Meg?" John's voice penetrated the darkness.

"John? Where are you?"

"I'm over here, by the eardrum."

The tiny cheerleader moved closer to the enormous membrane. On the other side, she could barely make out a human shape. "Thank god you're all right," she said, trying to embrace the figure - only to be thwarted by the drum. Touching the outline on the eardrum would have to be enough to satisfy her for now.

"I was so worried about you too. When you didn't come out with me, I thought -"

"Oh please god - I'm going to be sick" came Theresa's booming, sarcastic voice.

"Shut up!" they both shouted in unison.

"Well, it looks like the balance of power has changed." John said.

"Fuck you - nothing has changed. I just know where both of you are now."

"Megan, do you still have that lighter?"

"Hm? Oh - yeah." she bluffed. She had no such device, but Theresa didn't need to know that.

"Ah, excellent." John turned and addressed the room around him. "Theresa, please allow me to give you an anatomy lesson. The inner ear is comprised of several key components - but the most important of them is the conch shell looking thing that my 'bitch whore slut of a girlfriend' is standing next too."

"Yeah - whatever."

"Now, you may or may not know that this conch looking thingy is filled with liquid - to help facilitate the sounds that you are currently hearing - and to maintain your balance. Without it - you wouldn't be able to stand up, much less walk a straight line." He turned to his girlfriend. "Megan, the lighter if you please?"

She made a loud 'click-click' sound, right on cue. It may have not sounded realistic - but when you're on the other side of someone's eardrum, EVERYTHING sounds strange.

"I'm sure that a smart girl like yourself has taken basic science and chemistry, haven't you Theresa?"

"Yeah . . ."

"So, what happens when you apply heat - such as a lighter, to a liquid - such as the inner ear?"

The giantess hesitated, seeing where this was going. "The liquid starts to boil?"

"Exactly!" he said, patting the wall of Theresa's ear canal. "Now, I don't know exactly WHAT will happen to you when my 'psycho cunt girlfriend' starts to heat up your inner ear - but it can't be good."

The world shook once again, but considerably less so than before, as Theresa sat down. Megan stumbled into the very inner ear she was holding hostage. She quickly stood up, extracting herself from the delicate mechanism and hoped nobody noticed.

"Alright - fine. You win. What do you want me to do?"

"First - get us some food. It's been hours since we ate last - and that was just the scraps we managed to scavenge out of your stomach."

"Then?"

"It's time to start looking into curing our condition. Go back to Meg's place and retrieve the ring. Then call a . . ."
1212121112221112121.title: The shrinkeys are in control!

choices: Evesdropping adventures
Leave
12121211122211122.content:
"Gnat, totally." She said. "I just wanted to see if we could." A trembling reverberated throughout the massive flesh chamber - a prelude of what was to come. "I didn't actually think that we'd do it."

Between tremors, John swam to the closest stomach wall. Drawing closer, he grabbed on to a fold in the meat, his fingers digging into Theresa. The substance seemed flimsy - yet proved deceptively strong. He motioned for Megan to join him. As she moved closer, he wrapped his arm around her waist.

"We better hang on. This is going to be fun." She didn't know if he meant that last part literally or sarcastically.

She didn't have time to ponder his words as Theresa went crazy. The wall the two shrunken people clung to suddenly began undulating madly. The liquid in her stomach began heaving and churning as Theresa tried to dislodge whatever was causing this . . . problem. The water level dropped, and then dropped again, leaving the two microscopic people hanging on her stomach wall. Briefly the motion subsided, while Theresa summoned her strength for the final round of porcelain god worship.

The earthquake - um, stomach -quake returned with a vengeance, but quickly faded. The two were dislodged from their perch as Theresa collapsed to the floor, spent. Moments later, the chamber was again in motion, apparently Theresa righting herself. Then a deluge of pure, clean water crashed down upon the two tiny people. After several long moments, the water stopped - with the chamber significantly fuller than before.

Megan bobbed to the surface. "Quiet the ride. You don't get that at Disneyland."

John surfaced next to her. "Yeah, nothing quite compares to being on the inside of a half mile tall female while she pukes her guts out."

Megan rolled over and started swimming, doing slow, lazy laps. "So, now what?"

"You tell me - you're the one who wanted to stay inside Theresa."

She turned and dogpaddled over to her boyfriend. "Well, we could stay put."

"Huh? Why?"

Instead of replying, Megan turned again and swam away. "Just think," she said, "nobody knows that we're here - Theresa included." She put her ear against the lining of Theresa's stomach. Above the dull throb of the giant heart, she could clearly hear the outside world. She heard the radio in the distance, muffled but distinct. She clearly heard Theresa mumbling to herself about seeing a shrink. Very faintly in the distance she could hear a police siren. She could feel the rocking as the giant unknowingly carried her tiny gastronomic passengers back to bed.

"I dont follow you."

"Have you ever had a voyeuristic tendency? A desire to spy on people?" She reached out and patted Theresa. "Where she goes, we go. What she does, we're privy too. What she says, we hear. Kinda cool, huh?"

"We cant stay here for too long."

"Why not?"

He juestured around the vast chamber. "This isn't a camping trip. How will we survive."

"We have a constant supply of food and water. We've got pleasant company, we've got entertainment. What more do you want?"

"I don't know - It sounds fun, but I don't really see me spending the weekend as an intestinal parasite."
12121211122211122.title: E Ticket Ride

Make the long journey out
Lay down and just cuddle
121212111222112.content:
John smiled and shook his head. "What? and how do you plan on doing that?"

"Easy, we tickle her from the inside" She smiles as he sighs.

"What are you, twelve? Come on.. lets have some REAL fun.." John reached out for her hand and Megan sighed and let him pull her close to him... their bodies held together in a hug... in the warm embrace in Megan's soon to be sister in law. The couple let go of each other and began to wander around the giantess' stomach.

"Wow... its so... hot... so much bigger than Ms Kitty..."

"I know...."He turns back to Megan, "not as good as yours though."

When he sees you, he sees a bug, and his foot quickly makes its second killing of the night, turning you into a smaller version of what the cockroach now is. 12321.title: Doomed, I tells ya!
