124.content:
The bartender hasn't noticed you yet and you are behind the counter. Maybe that's not so bad. While you are so far away from them, other people won't be able to hear you anyway. They might even mistake you for a bug and then SQUAT! Blindly hoping that someone will help you won't get you anywhere close to salvation. You need a plan and in order to develop it, a safe hiding place. So let's check this locale out.
         Behind the counter, glasses, bottles, and peanuts are stored. Littering the plain you are standing on are therefore peanut crumbs, lakes of beer and whiskey, cigarette stumps, and things beyond imagination. You start exploring your surroundings by approaching the wall of the counter's front, giving the bartender a glance every now and again to make sure that he hasn't noticed you yet.
         There are several bags of peanuts there, some of them open, some of them closed. The peanuts inside are boulders bigger than you are tall with a rough surface and surrounded by dust and pebbles where pieces and chips have fallen off. You wouldn't be safe there as peanuts are for free, and this makes them a favorite among party- goers.
         The sink is to the right which means that you are better off heading to the left. After the peanuts grounds, you close in on the wonderful springs. The smells of different alcoholic beverages mix in the air and you begin feeling light- headed. Here are the smaller bottles the bartender keeps close to the counter. The ground is sticky after years of spilled drinks and only little cleaning.
         This is an easy- going party and the guys around here aren't into the really serious stuff. Therefore, you should be reasonably safe here. And if you concentrate, you may be able to ignore the alcohol surrounding you. You don't want to keep on walking around in front of the bartender either, because you don't think your good luck will hold much longer.
         Therefore, you settle down between the bottles, the smallest of which still being as big as a five- story building and begin analysing your situation: The lousy party, Marsha, the ring, your sudden transformation. You are finding it hard to concentrate though, as you constantly inhale the alcohol's aromatic smell. To your left, there is a bottle that has toppled over. It is nearly empty, so nothing had spilled onto the table, but what remains still smells very interesting. And no one will want to have these left- overs, would they? So what do you do?
124.title: The Land where Beer and Whiskey Flow

choices: You cling to the uvula praying for a miracle
You bravely jump into her throat
1241.content:
You decide that no one would have any use for the remaining beverage and you are just dying to get a drink. After all, you really deserve one given the circumstances.
         Thus, you climb into the bottle. The glass is slippery and hard to stand on, but you manage to reach the pool of liquid in the bottle's center. Bending down, you collect some of it in your hands and start drinking. The taste is great and you really needed a drink. The alcohol goes to your head immediately, of course. Forgetting all fear, you sit down in the pool and start drinking.
         You don't get far, though, as the bottle is suddenly lifted. There is nothing you could hang on to, so you drop to the bottom when it is held straightened up. The fear and shock have sobered you up enough to fully realize your predicament (although you still feel like giggling at its absurdity). You are thrown about as the bottle is rotated and then emptied into a very small glass (still much too big for the drink and far too high for you to scale). You are feeling dizzy and a bit sick.
         The glass is handed over the counter and in spite of the distorting effect, you are able to recognize Patricia through the clear walls of your prison. Patricia is a fine girl, a bit head strong (read: she turned down your offers for a date) though. She has short, blonde hair and is wearing a blue blouse and trousers of the same hue. You had always wanted to get close to her, but this is going a bit too far.
         Oblivious to your tiny shape, Patricia moves the glass to her mouth parting her gorgeous lips to reveal the giant, glistening cavern beyond. You shiver at that deadly beauty. Suddenly everything turns upside down and you are thrown forward as Patricia downs the drink. By some special prank of fate, you are propelled at her uvula, soft, warm and slimey, while the drink is making its way into her throat. Do you desperately cling to her uvula, although you won't be able to hold onto its slick surface for long, or do you take your fate with pride, and let go? What do you do?

You cling onto the uvula, hoping for some miracle to happen. Like Patricia choking, spitting you out or something.
         By now, all of the drink has disappeared into that hungry maw. The only thing left for it to devour is you. Patricia has closed her mouth and the darkness should normally protect you from that terrible sight, but somehow, you are still able to see, although the colors seem somewhat fainter, darker.          Finally, you can't hang on anymore, and with a last, desperate scream, you fall down into the warm darkness of Patricia's throat. Your speed increases as you get deeper and deeper, with nothing there to hang onto, nothing to break your fall. Everything is just a blurr of red, glistening walls passing by.
         Then the path suddenly splits into two. Before you have a chance to react, you are swept into the left one. After a short ride, you land on some spongy, wet surface. There are tiny caverns everywhere, as well as some larger ones. The only exit is above.
         You don't have time to take in this beauty, because everything suddenly contracts violently several times. Not knowing what to think of it, you cling to the ground. Another round of quakes and then everything turns quiet. The chamber you are in begins to steadily expand with fresh, humid air rushing into it. Then it begins to shrink, only to begin expanding again. After marvelling at this cycle you realize that you must be inside Patricia's lung! And somehow, your presence has slipped past her, after the initial greeting. This is incredible.
         What will you do now, though? WIll you try to carefully explore the lung in hope of finding a safe way to exit, or do you take the risk and try to make Patricia cough you up?

124121.content:
Since you've seen an awkward spot on the wall of Patricia's stomach, you figure that's as good a place as any to try to agitate her into throwing you up. As you start pushing, pulling and scratching on that side of the wall, you almost throw up yourself at how gross it is, but then you remember that you're actually trying to be carried up out of this girl's esophagus in a big mass of vomit, so you figure it's not time for that.

Soon enough, the stomach around you starts rumbling. Looks like your work is paying off.
----------------------
Patricia thought the night was going well. Her hair was cute, her outfit looked great, and she had already run into a couple of people she knew. Unfortunately, all of a sudden she started feeling sick. "What the hell," she thought, "this is only my second drink." She reflects that it might not have been a good idea to let the bartender pour out her drink from a bottle that had been overturned on the counter, but her thoughts were cut short when she realized she had to run to the bathroom, and fast.

She didn't make it. Right as Patricia was about to push her way through the last of the crowd to make it into the bathroom, everything she'd ate, drank or swallowed from the last six hours came rushing up outside of her. And wouldn't you know it, she threw up all over some other girl. The other girl, horrified, looks down at her dress, now covered in vomit, and then looks up at Patricia and slaps her.
---------------------
A few seconds after you started getting Patricia's stomach rumbling, everything was suddenly shoved upwards, well before you had any time to think about what you were doing. It did occur to you that most people throw up into the toilet - absolutely not where you want this situation to go - but right as you realize that, you find yourself flying through the air, and before you know it you've stopped.

You look around and discover that you've just been vomited onto the red dress of some girl you've never seen before. The lighting inside the bar is terrible, so you figure you're not about to get seen amidst the pile of everything else thrown up along with you, but you're pretty concerned you won't stay stuck on this girl's dress for long. It's a long way down.
124121.title: Up and Out

13.content:
You need to get help fast. Really fast before things get worse. After all, you don't really know what has happened to you and whether it may continue. But if someone else knew, you may have a chance of seeing this through.
         You sense some motion to your right. Turning you see that Jane has taken the seat next to the one you had while being normal sized. This may be your big chance! You have dated Jane a few times and she is a decent girl that isn't pushing things or exerting pressure or anything. She has long blonde hair and is medium sized and slim (well, currently, she seems to be a gigantic, lumbering mountain, but compared to the other ones, a slim medium- sized one).
         You notice that there's no one she is talking to. Instead, she is eating peanuts while obviously thinking about something. She seems to be quite sober, so she may just be the person you would want to reach first at this place. Besides, that red and blue outfit of hers is really sexy.
          You run towards her, reaching the space on the counter before her just as the bartender puts down her drink. Though he probably did it in a gentle motion, it seems to you as if a grenade exploded right next to you. As you get up on your feet again, the bartender has already left. The glass seems slender and must be pretty small. This is not good, you want her to be sober. Well, you are quite close to her, so what now?
13.title: Isn't that Jane at the Bar?

choices: You continue to dodge the hand until a hiding place is found
You try to jump onto the hand before it is lifted again
131.content:
Thus far, you have been lucky, but heaven knows how long this will continue. You need help and you need it now! So you start waving your arms and shouting in order to catch Jane's attention. Unfortunately, she doesn't seem to notice you at all. While you are still waving your arms, you are trying to figure out what other means of contacting her you would have.
         At this moment she notices you. Her eyes are focusing on you and her facial expression is changing. It's changing to - disgust! You have seen that expression on many faces, therefore you know that the time to run for your life has come. Jane moves only little, but it makes a gigantic shadow move above you like lightning. You start criss- crossing as her hand slams down on the counter just a feet away from you, the blast of air knocking you from your feet. But you have no time to rest. The next second, you are back on your feet running and running as the hand is lifted and approaching you again. The hand misses you again as you dive to the left in the very last moment. What are you going to do?

Obviously, someone has seen the lonesome lady at the bar and has decided to be her prince in shining armor. Unfortunately, that someone happens to be Jack Fieldings. He looks okay with his brown hair and average size, although his glasses put him into the nerd department. But actually, he is one of the biggest and most successful perverts on the campus. Even if the girls are sharing their experiences with him, no one would believe him to be that way, he just looks too boring. Jane would really deserve better than him.
         Jack has taken the seat to Jane's right and immediately ordered his drink. With both arms on the counter, he started conversation with Jane the very same moment keeping her occupied ever since. Listening in on their talk, you are not yet sure, whether she is falling for him or not. At least she isn't trying to kill you at the moment.
         Lover boy here is wearing a rather conservative- looking jacket. As his hands are on the table, you could easily enter that jacket's arm piece. Using his arms as a means of transportation, you may be able to get closer to Jane or someone else (with Jack definitely not being on that list). So what will it be?

131111.content:
It's pure fluke that you survive being crushed by all the stuff that is being carried in this bag with you, but you are still bruised all over and hurting when it is finally put down and opened.

It is a few moments before Leah spots something that she hadn't put in the bag and decides to take it out to look at it. It would be pointless to resist; you would be crushed by her probing. So it is that you let her youthful fingers grasp you and drag you out into the light.

She is none too gentle, but as you are you can't notice any extra pain over that you already have. At least her fingertips are warm and soft, and smell rather nice.

You don't get to take much of a look around the room before you are dragged inexorably towards her face. While you wouldn't have looked at someone her age twice only a day ago, from your current perspective you have to admit that she is rather attractive. Her lips, while big enough to eat a house and inexpertly daubed in lipstick, are plump and full; her nose, despite its current dimensional similarity to a two ton truck, is nicely rounded and none too big; her blue eyes manage to sparkle even through the obscene amounts of glitter that she's sprinkled onto her eyelids; her skin is flawless, bereft of freckle or mole. Youth does have its attractions. Unfortunately, maturity isn't one of them.

'Cool!' she squeals when she finally focuses her eyes on you. 'I found the tooth fairy!'

You desperately argue against this hypothesis, but she can't hear you over her own talk, and she denies it herself anyway.

'Course, you can't be the tooth fairy, you're too small to be able to lift a pillow, let alone carry a quarter!'

She giggles again, falling backwards onto her bed. The rush for you is even more extreme than the handbag ride, and you're out of breath by the time that it is over, held against her nose.

Her eyes are closed and she is laughing gently to herself, but she soon recovers, holding you at arm's length above her head while she lies on her back, stretching her legs off the edge of the bed.

'I'm sure that you know who you are.' you says slowly. 'But I'm not sure if I care!' she adds cheekily, winking at you.

Hmmm.
131111.title: Can't get a drink?  Find some other way to ent

1311111.content:
"Well?' Leah asks, a look of mild annoyance crossing her face. 'What are you?'

You laugh, and tell her your whle sorry story. She can't hear you, so you may as well get things out of your system.

'Wow, that's incredible!' she gasps.

She can hear and understand you! But after what else happened to you tonight, nothing can surprise you anymore. To Hell with thinking of a scientific explanation. It's that fucking ring, it's done things to you. You wonder what other powers you have, apart from the ability to be squished really easily and scream loud enough for the killer to hear.

You are swept back down to a lower level, and end up in the palm of Leah's hands as she sits down on her bed, crossing her legs beneath her and gazing down in awe at the miniature man standing on her flesh. You take in the towering fingers and thumbs circling you, and the warmth emanating from both them and the 'floor'. You notice that Leah is no longer wearing the dress she wore at the bar, now she is ready for bed, wearing a sleveless top and a pair of shorts, both yellow. From where you're standing, the view isn't too bad. Another couple of years...

'We're going back to the bar tonight, so I can take you with me to find the ring.' she tells you. 'Course, you'll owe me for saving your life. I bet you're evn cuter at actual size...'

She grins cheekily, and moves one of her hands away to open a drawer to her left. Then she lowers you into it with the other, and you jump off to find youself in her underwear drawer, filled with large white structures that you decide must be Leah's bras and panties. You look up to see her gentle face smiling down at you, her fingers drumming idly over the edge of the drawer wall.

'You can sleep here for tonight.' she whispers, before blowing you a kiss. 'Goodnight!'

Then she vanishes from view, and you are thrown down into the underwear as the drawer closes, blocking out all light. Looks like there's nothing to do now but sleep in a large room full of a giantess' delicates. Things are looking up.

You are woken from a long and dreamless sleep by another earthquake, and the appearance of a growing line of light above you. You emerge blinking into it, and realise how ravenous you are. You haven't eaten since lunch yesterday. Leah appears above you like a goddess descending from heaven. This morning she is wearing a grey ruched top with 'Gorgeous' sequinned across the front in pink, and bears salvation, like any true goddess. She deposits a huge saucer next to you, with a pool of water at its centre and a piece of bread crust the size of you balanced on the edge. You won't be going hungry this morning, and thank Leah while she sits and watches you eat, gigling as you struggle to break bread and almost fall into the water.

"How could you take so long, John?" she chides you. "I'm already late - now I'm gonna miss the bus!"

Bus to where, you wonder, as you are hurridly stuffed into a pocket. You huddle into a corner, keeping as far away from any intruding fingers as possible, and await what is to come.
